wolfhome.name: Wolfhome
wolfhome.theme: Garou sanctuary, what Earth should be
wolfhome.description: The world as it should have been. Safe for Garou. A preview of victory.

regions.the_town: Settlement where Garou and humans coexist

hazards: Forgetting the real world needs you

battleground.name: Battleground
battleground.description: Eternal warfare between all factions. No permanent victory possible.

regions.plain_of_the_apocalypse: Where the final battle is eternally rehearsed

legendary_realm.name: Legendary Realm
legendary_realm.description: Where stories become real. Every legend has territory here.

dream_zone.name: Dream Zone
dream_zone.theme: Dreams and their intersection with Umbra
dream_zone.description: Border realm between Middle Umbra and Astral. Where dreams spill over.

aetherial_realm.name: Aetherial Realm
aetherial_realm.description: The spirit realm of space. Home of Luna, Helios, and planetary Incarnae.

regions.the_sun: Helios's domain. Dangerous for dark creatures.

aetherial_realm.notes: Moon Bridge apex is safest place in all reality—Luna guards personally.

meta.description: Tribal Homelands - spiritual territories tied to each tribe's identity

black_furies.theme: Sacred feminine, moon-touched wilds, warrior women's sanctuary
black_furies.description: Wild places untouched by patriarchal influence. Moon-blessed groves where the Furies' ancestors dwell.
black_furies.access: Female Garou favored; males may enter but face hostility from guardian spirits

bone_gnawers.theme: Urban refuge, hope in squalor, finding beauty in the discarded
bone_gnawers.description: Rundown but not hopeless. Junkyards that gleam, alleys that shelter, forgotten places that remember.
bone_gnawers.access: Those who know poverty and still hope; the humble

children_of_gaia.theme: Peaceful glades, harmony between all Gaia's children
children_of_gaia.description: Where all of Gaia's children—Garou, Fera, spirits—can meet in peace. Weapons do not function.
children_of_gaia.access: Open to all who come in peace; violence is literally impossible

fianna.theme: Celtic otherworld, passion, revelry, and fierce joy
fianna.description: Eternal festival, endless hunt, songs that never end. The fire of life burns bright here.
fianna.access: Those with passion in their hearts; the joyful and the fierce

get_of_fenris.theme: Frozen battlefields, warrior halls, eternal struggle
get_of_fenris.description: Valhalla-like realm of constant challenge. Warriors test themselves endlessly against worthy foes.
get_of_fenris.access: Proven warriors; the weak are driven out by the cold

glass_walkers.theme: Urban spirit network, technology and spirit united
glass_walkers.description: City as Gaia intended—technology serving spirit, humans and Garou coexisting, progress with purpose.
glass_walkers.access: Those who understand the city can be sacred; adaptable minds

red_talons.description: World without humanity. Pure wolf territory. No cities, no farms, no human anything.
red_talons.access: Lupus strongly favored; Homids may find it hostile or unreachable

shadow_lords.theme: Dark mountains, seats of power, political mastery
shadow_lords.description: Thunder Mountain realm. Places of rule and command, where strength and cunning earn dominion.
shadow_lords.access: Those who would rule; the ambitious and the strong

silver_fangs.theme: Noble courts, moonlit palaces, hereditary glory
silver_fangs.description: The Garou Nation as it should be—united under rightful Silver Fang rule, pure and glorious.
silver_fangs.access: Those of noble bearing; purity of blood or purpose

stargazers.theme: Mountain peaks, celestial vistas, inner wisdom
stargazers.description: High places where stars speak and inner truth becomes clear. Meditation made manifest.
stargazers.access: The contemplative; those seeking inner truth over outer victory

uktena.theme: Spirit lodges, hidden mysteries, guarded secrets
uktena.description: Repository of dark knowledge safely contained. Mysteries within mysteries.
uktena.access: Seekers of knowledge; those who understand some secrets must be kept

wendigo.theme: Frozen north, ancestral grounds, pure cold vengeance
wendigo.description: The Pure Lands as they were before European contact. Cold, clean, and merciless to invaders.
wendigo.access: Those who honor the land; invaders face the killing cold

black_spiral_dancers.theme: What was White Howler territory, now twisted by Wyrm
black_spiral_dancers.description: Once beautiful highlands, now nightmare realm of corruption. Lion weeps for what was lost.
black_spiral_dancers.current_state: Malfeas-touched, home to Dancer training grounds and pits

bunyip.description: Lost when the Bunyip were exterminated. Some say echoes persist in the Deep Umbra.
bunyip.current_state: Faded or inaccessible. Ngalyod (Rainbow Serpent) mourns.
bunyip.rumors: Bunyip spirits may still exist in Deep Umbra, waiting

croatan.description: Croatan sacrificed themselves and their homeland to bind a great Wyrm-thing.
croatan.current_state: Sealed away as part of the binding. Entry might weaken the seal.
croatan.warning: DO NOT ATTEMPT TO ACCESS. The binding must hold.

silent_striders.description: Cursed by Grandmother (an aspect of the Wyrm). Striders cannot return to their homeland.
silent_striders.current_state: Exists but inaccessible to Striders. Haunted by their ancestors they cannot reach.
silent_striders.curse: Any Strider who enters is consumed by Grandmother's power

corax.description: High places where secrets gather and ravens commune with Helios.
corax.access: Those who trade in information; seekers of truth

nuwisha.description: Constantly shifting territory where nothing is as it seems and laughter echoes eternally.
nuwisha.access: Those who can take a joke; the clever and the humble

second_breath_rites.description: Tribal traditions for a cub's first entry into the Penumbra
second_breath_rites.black_furies: Moonlit glades, warrior challenges, stories of legendary Furies
second_breath_rites.bone_gnawers: Rundown parks, trashed campsites—finding beauty in spiritual refuse
second_breath_rites.children_of_gaia: Tranquil glades, meditation, tales of Gaia's beauty
second_breath_rites.fianna: Passionate hunts, celebratory dances, defiant songs against Apocalypse
second_breath_rites.get_of_fenris: Brutal hunts, Wyld-spirit binding, bane nest raids—earning first scars
second_breath_rites.glass_walkers: Both urban and wild—learning dual responsibility
second_breath_rites.red_talons: Deep wilds, wolf-form only, destroy reflection of human establishment
second_breath_rites.shadow_lords: Lessons in leadership and responsibility, placing cubs in their proper place
second_breath_rites.silent_striders: Long exhausting journeys, stories shared wherever they end up
second_breath_rites.silver_fangs: Famous caerns, tribal history, baptism in purified lakes
second_breath_rites.stargazers: Lofty reaches, star-gazing, celestial spirit visitations
second_breath_rites.uktena: Ancestral paths, omen interpretation, mystic tradition
second_breath_rites.wendigo: Bitter cold territories, prey representing enemies—especially European tribe symbols

agatha_prim.name: Agatha Prim
agatha_prim.purpose: Help other Kami come into their strength; accelerate Kami awakening
agatha_prim.description: Veterinarian savant who cares for animals with supernatural skill. Unknowingly serves Gaia by nurturing proto-Kami among her patients.
powers: Beast of Burden
Animal Control
Immunity to the Delirium
Piercing Gaze
plot_hooks: A Theurge wants to bring her into the Garou fold, but others fear endangering her
The land beneath her ranch is awakening as a Land Kami

jerome_tech_worker.name: Jerome
jerome_tech_worker.purpose: Effect change from within corrupt systems
jerome_tech_worker.geas: Never abandon the fight from within
jerome_tech_worker.description: Tech worker unknowingly becoming Kami. Posts on spiritual subreddits with suspicious knowledge of Garou.
plot_hooks: Characters must liberate him from corporate world before corruption takes hold
His online posts contain hidden truths about the Garou Nation

mannon_jedd.name: Mannon Jedd
mannon_jedd.purpose: Rescue orphaned cubs before the Wyrm claims them
mannon_jedd.description: Former werewolf hunter who spared a cub during First Change. Now travels finding orphans for the Nation.
mannon_jedd.notes: Knows about werewolves; earned Gaia's blessing through mercy
plot_hooks: Brings news of a cub in Spiral territory
His past catches up—former hunting companions seek revenge

cousin_rabbit.name: Cousin Rabbit
cousin_rabbit.geas: Never let the strong bully the weak unchallenged
cousin_rabbit.description: Clever rabbit Kami who uses wit to protect prey animals from predators—including corrupted ones.
plot_hooks: Leads pack on merry chase to distract them from Wyrm-hunters
Knows location of hidden Glen but will only share through riddles

opinnartokua.name: Opinnartokua
opinnartokua.purpose: Mobile caern for Rokea; follow Gaia's song
opinnartokua.description: Ancient blue whale, possibly prehistoric. Body scarred by every weapon humans made. Follows a song only he can hear—Gaia's voice to him since before humans existed.
powers: Longevity
Mega-Attribute (x3)
Shifter Kinship (Rokea)
Wellspring
opinnartokua.notes: Blind, ancient, content. The song grows quieter—he believes he will soon meet his love.
plot_hooks: Endron tanker positioned to cause oil spill in his path—obvious trap
Something turned him from his path; last two times, disasters followed
Same-Bito Rokea seek help preventing his death

the_hive.name: The Hive
the_hive.description: A bee colony functioning as a single Kami consciousness. Protects pollinators across a wide region.
plot_hooks: Colony collapse threatens the Kami's existence
Hive knows of Wyrm corruption in local agriculture

misha_bush.name: Misha Bush
misha_bush.geas: Never let a child come to harm in your presence
misha_bush.description: Bear Kami who appears when children are threatened. Gentle with the innocent, terrifying to predators.
plot_hooks: Appears at site of child disappearances
Leads pack to fomor kidnapping ring

shallowbranch.name: Shallowbranch
shallowbranch.purpose: Provide shelter and peace to all who need it
shallowbranch.geas: Provide hospitality to friends, and shelter even to foes
shallowbranch.description: Young willow by her standards, but old as Kami. Gives shelter to anyone—even Black Spiral Dancers. Dreams beneath her branches are gentle, but may slip into Dream Zone.
powers: Aura of Tranquility
Safe Place
Spirit Den
plot_hooks: Conservationists vs business battle over her fate
Troubled dreams are her only way to warn of witnessed danger
First Team fomori using her thin Gauntlet as shortcut

drosera_glanduligera.name: Drosera glanduligera
drosera_glanduligera.description: Carnivorous plant Kami. Small but deadly to Wyrm-creatures. Grows around a hidden caern.
plot_hooks: Expanding beyond its territory—something driving it
Contains Wyrm creature it cannot fully digest

shrewton_village.name: Shrewton Village
shrewton_village.description: A village of 10,000 where Gaia needs children to dream. The Kami subtly prevents children from leaving, manipulating events with patient precision.
powers: Aura of Tranquility
Curse of Gaia
Lord of the Land
shrewton_village.umbral_appearance: Buildings have smiling house-faces like children's drawings. Dream spirits everywhere.
plot_hooks: Nightmares disrupting children's sleep—against Kami's very being
Friend trying to leave with child faces 'coincidences' keeping her
Population aging; Kami fears losing dream production

the_one_oh_oh.name: The One-Oh-Oh
the_one_oh_oh.geas: No traveler on my road shall come to undeserved harm
the_one_oh_oh.description: A stretch of highway that has become Kami. Accidents are rare; travelers feel protected. Trucks seem to avoid jackknifing.
plot_hooks: Wyrm forces trying to corrupt the highway
Pack needs safe passage through hostile territory

woodsman_park.name: Woodsman Park
woodsman_park.purpose: Spread peace; invite humans to join the trees
woodsman_park.geas: Offer peace to all who enter
woodsman_park.description: Park where trees share root network, forming one symbiotic Kami. People who enter don't tend to leave—they join the trees. Peace spreads outward.
woodsman_park.notes: Potentially problematic—people are leaving to join
plot_hooks: Is this Gaia's will or corruption of purpose?

prohibition.description: Something the Kami must never do
examples: Never eat what you didn't prepare yourself
Never refuse a request for help
Never turn away from a fight against the Wyrm
Never reveal your true nature to non-Kinfolk
Never break your word once given
Shelter all who ask, even enemies
Never turn away a hungry traveler
Feed any who come to your door
Protect guests unto your own death
Share your fire with any who need warmth
Nothing deserves to suffer (must alleviate pain)
Let no child come to harm in your presence
Guard this place against all corruption
Protect the innocent from the knowing
Stand between the weak and those who would harm them
Never let a sacred site be desecrated

movement.description: Restrictions on how the Kami travels
examples: Travel only by means Gaia gave you (no vehicles)
Return to your home territory every full moon
Walk the same path your ancestors walked
Never enter a place of the Wyrm willingly
Sing to the moon each night
Do not interfere with natural death
Do not speak unless spoken to
Share all food with others before eating yourself
Fast during the dark of the moon

transformation.description: Requirements tied to the Kami's form
examples: Maintain your roots in the earth (plant Kami)

agatha_prim.implications: Must alleviate pain when encountered; cannot ignore suffering even in enemies

opinnartokua.implications: Eternal migration; stopping means failing purpose; rest only while traveling

shallowbranch.geas: Provide hospitality to friends, and shelter even to foes
shallowbranch.implications: Cannot refuse shelter to anyone, even Black Spiral Dancers

shrewton_village.implications: Cannot allow anything to disturb children's sleep; manipulates events to keep children in village

cousin_rabbit.geas: Never let the strong bully the weak unchallenged
cousin_rabbit.implications: Must intervene when witnessing bullying, even against overwhelming odds

misha_bush.geas: Never let a child come to harm in your presence
misha_bush.implications: Absolute protection of children; will fight to death for any child

drosera_glanduligera.implications: Cannot feed on pure beings; hunts only Wyrm-tainted

guidelines: Tie the geas to the Kami's purpose
Make it specific enough to be meaningful
Ensure it creates interesting story complications
Balance restriction with the Kami's capabilities
Consider how breaking it affects powers
absolution: Perform great service to balance the breach

meta.description: Powers available to Kami - beings imbued with Gaia's essence

animal_control.name: Animal Control
animal_control.description: Command and communicate with animals of a specific type
animal_control.system: Spend 1 Gnosis to command animals within sight. Charisma + Animal Ken vs difficulty based on animal's willfulness.

armored_hide.name: Armored Hide
armored_hide.system: Gain 2 additional soak dice against bashing and lethal damage.
armored_hide.notes: Many animal Kami receive this free based on species

aura_of_tranquility.name: Aura of Tranquility
aura_of_tranquility.system: All within (Gnosis x 5) yards must make Willpower roll (difficulty 7) to initiate violence. Rage rolls to resist frenzy gain +2 difficulty.

beast_of_burden.name: Beast of Burden
beast_of_burden.system: Double carrying capacity. Fatigue penalties halved. Can work/travel twice as long without rest.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Grants the ability to frenzy like a shapeshifter
berserker.system: Gain 5 permanent Rage. May frenzy as Garou do. Subject to all frenzy rules.

chameleon_coloration.name: Chameleon Coloration
chameleon_coloration.system: Add Gnosis to Stealth dice pools. +3 difficulty for others to spot the Kami when stationary.

claws_and_fangs.name: Claws and Fangs
claws_and_fangs.description: Natural weapons capable of dealing significant damage
claws_and_fangs.system: Claws deal Strength +2 lethal. Bite deals Strength +1 lethal.
claws_and_fangs.notes: Predatory animal Kami often receive this free

curse_of_gaia.name: Curse of Gaia
curse_of_gaia.description: Inflict Gaia's displeasure on those who harm the Kami
curse_of_gaia.system: Spend 1 Gnosis when attacked. Attacker rolls Willpower (difficulty 8) or suffers -2 dice to all pools for the scene. May be used once per attacker per scene.

darksight.name: Darksight
darksight.system: No penalties for darkness of any kind, including supernatural darkness.
darksight.notes: Nocturnal animal Kami often receive this free

extra_limbs.name: Extra Limbs
extra_limbs.system: Gain 2 extra limbs. May make one additional attack per round without splitting dice pool, or gain +2 dice to grappling.

heart_sense.name: Heart Sense
heart_sense.description: Perceive the emotional and spiritual state of others
heart_sense.system: Perception + Empathy (difficulty 6) to sense emotions. 3+ successes reveals spiritual corruption or Wyrm-taint.

immunity_to_delirium.name: Immunity to the Delirium
immunity_to_delirium.description: Not affected by the Delirium when viewing Crinos werewolves
immunity_to_delirium.system: Automatically immune to Delirium. May remember and comprehend werewolf war-forms.
immunity_to_delirium.notes: All animal Kami receive this free

longevity.name: Longevity
longevity.system: Age at 1/10th normal rate. Immune to diseases of old age. May live for centuries.

mega_attribute.name: Mega-Attribute
mega_attribute.description: One Attribute raised to superhuman levels
mega_attribute.system: Choose one Attribute. Its maximum increases by 3, and gain 2 free dots in it. May be purchased multiple times for different Attributes.

piercing_gaze.name: Piercing Gaze
piercing_gaze.system: Add Gnosis to all rolls to detect lies, illusions, or disguises. May spend 1 Gnosis to automatically see through mundane deception.

plant_animation.name: Plant Animation
plant_animation.system: Spend 1 Gnosis to animate plants within (Willpower x 10) yards. Plants can entangle (Strength 4), create barriers, or attack (4 dice bashing).

shifter_kinship.name: Shifter Kinship
shifter_kinship.description: Recognized as kin by a specific Changing Breed
shifter_kinship.system: Specify one Changing Breed. That breed treats the Kami as Kinfolk. May learn one Level 1 Gift from that breed.

size.name: Size
size.system: Each purchase increases size category: +1 Strength, +1 Stamina, +1 Health Level, -1 Dexterity (minimum 1). Reverse for smaller. May purchase up to 3 times either direction.
size.notes: Animal Kami receive appropriate Size free based on species

spirit_ties.name: Spirit Ties
spirit_ties.description: Deeper connection to the spirit world
spirit_ties.system: Increase maximum Gnosis: Human to 6, Animal to 8, Plant/Land to 10. Gain +2 dice on all spirit interaction rolls.

wings.name: Wings
wings.system: May fly at running speed. Requires open space to take off. May hover with Dexterity + Athletics (difficulty 6).
wings.notes: Flying animal Kami receive this free

lord_of_the_land.name: Lord of the Land
lord_of_the_land.description: Perceive everything occurring on the Kami's surface
lord_of_the_land.system: Perception + Alertness (difficulty 6) to detect anything on the Kami's surface and up to (Willpower x 3) yards above it. Cloaked presence still detected but location imprecise.

moonstone.name: Moonstone
moonstone.description: Body functions as a Moon Bridge pathstone
moonstone.system: Moon Bridges may link directly to the Kami. Requires Spirit Den power. Does not automatically confer Rite of the Opening Bridge.

safe_place.name: Safe Place
safe_place.description: Blocks Umbral access to the Kami
safe_place.system: Gauntlet within (Gnosis x 5) yards becomes difficulty 9 to cross. Success ejects travelers outside the protected area, not onto the Kami.

spirit_den.name: Spirit Den
spirit_den.description: Thin Gauntlet allows easy Umbral passage through the Kami
spirit_den.system: No roll needed to pass between Umbra and Kami's center. If combined with Safe Place, functions as permanent Rite of the Shrouded Glen.

wellspring.name: Wellspring
wellspring.system: Spend 2 Gnosis per caern level (max 10 Gnosis for Level 5). For one lunar month, function as caern of that level for all purposes (no type). May terminate early. Recover half invested Gnosis when power ends.
wellspring.notes: All Rorqual possess this power for free

species_powers.description: Animal Kami receive up to 3 powers free based on their species

creation_rules.overview: Totems are powerful Jagglings that adopt a pack. Cost reflects both the totem's power and the demands it places on the pack. Pack members pool Background dots to meet the cost.

cost_breakdown.base_cost: Totem's inherent power level (4-7 typical, can go higher)
cost_breakdown.additional_points: Pack can invest extra pooled dots for enhancements

individual_traits.description: Benefits that ALL pack members receive simultaneously. These should be thematically linked to the totem spirit and scaled appropriately to Background Cost.

attributes.notes: Should be modest; see combat_caution below

unique_abilities.description: Special narrow benefits (e.g., perfect direction sense, immunity to specific effects)

difficulty_modifiers.description: Bonuses to specific rolls (e.g., -1 difficulty to tracking, -2 difficulty to resist fear)
difficulty_modifiers.notes: Applied to specific circumstances, not broad categories

permanent_renown.description: Permanent Renown bonuses (e.g., +2 Glory, +1 Honor, +3 Wisdom)

permanent_renown_importance.description: Permanent Renown from a Totem is a vast boon in the eyes of the spirits.
reasoning: Climbing Rank in W20 is a long, difficult process
Garou must earn Temporary Renown through deeds
Temporary Renown must then be qualified into Permanent Renown (often requiring Rites, challenges, or ST approval)
Enough Permanent Renown across categories is needed to advance in Rank
Receiving Permanent Renown directly from a Totem accelerates this process significantly
It represents the spirits themselves recognizing the pack's worth

combat_caution.description: When designing Individual Traits that enhance combat, remember that Garou already possess substantial combat advantages.

garou_combat_baseline.other_advantages: Rage for extra actions, regeneration, natural weapons

combat_caution.guidance: This does not mean War totems cannot grant combat bonuses—they absolutely can and should. But those bonuses should be considered carefully and kept proportionate.
good_examples: Difficulty modifiers for specific combat situations
Bonuses that apply in narrow circumstances (vs. Wyrm creatures, when defending packmates, etc.)
caution_examples: +3 Strength on top of Crinos may unbalance the game
Broad damage bonuses to all attacks

pack_traits.description: More powerful benefits than Individual Traits, but with key limitations: only ONE pack member can benefit at a time, and usage is typically capped per story or session.
pack_traits.design_philosophy: Pack Traits should be unique and interesting, with a high degree of 'coolness' attributed to them.

willpower_pool.notes: Most common Pack Trait; represents the totem 'pushing' its influence in the pack's favor during high-stakes moments
willpower_pool.mechanics: Can be spent like personal Willpower (automatic successes, activating powers, resisting effects). Once spent, gone for everyone until next story.

attributes.notes: Higher than Individual Traits; one member at a time

abilities.notes: Can exceed normal Individual caps; one member at a time

gifts.description: Access to a specific Gift (often Level 1-2)
gifts.notes: Usable by any pack member, typically with usage limits

unique_powers.description: Signature abilities (e.g., Berserker without frenzy, perfect tracking)
unique_powers.notes: Define the totem's identity; should be memorable and impactful

spirit_interaction.description: Social/Umbral benefits (e.g., respected by spirits of X type, can communicate with Y)

usage_limitations.description: To prevent abuse, Pack Traits often include limitations on usage.

limitation_types.per_story: e.g., 'The pack shares 4 Willpower per story'
limitation_types.per_scene: e.g., 'One pack member may add +3 Brawl per scene'
limitation_types.per_use: e.g., 'Once per story, a pack member may use the Gift: Sense Wyrm'
limitation_types.circumstantial: e.g., 'Only when defending the caern' or 'Only against Wyrm-tainted foes'

usage_limitations.guidance: The more powerful the Pack Trait, the stricter the limitation should be.

cost_4.label: Minor Totem
cost_4.individual_traits: 2 pts Permanent Renown + minor Ability/Attribute bonus or difficulty modifier
cost_4.pack_traits: 2-3 Willpower per story + modest shared ability
cost_4.design_notes: Good for new packs or those wanting less demanding relationships. Bans are usually specific (protect X, never hunt Y).

cost_5.label: Standard Totem
cost_5.pack_traits: 3-5 Willpower per story + notable power (Gift or unique combat ability)
cost_5.ban_severity: Significant - behavioral restrictions that affect combat or social situations
cost_5.design_notes: Most common totem tier. Bans begin to have teeth (never flee fights, never kill vermin). Special powers like 'Berserker without frenzy' or 'Mother's Touch Gift' appear here.

cost_6.label: Powerful Totem
cost_6.individual_traits: 3 pts Permanent Renown (may be enhanced, e.g., +3 Honor) + strong Ability bonus or difficulty modifier
cost_6.pack_traits: 3-4 Willpower per story + impressive specialized power
cost_6.ban_severity: Demanding - ongoing obligations or broad behavioral requirements
cost_6.design_notes: Sweet spot for packs wanting meaningful power without extreme demands. Situational bonuses allow for niche specialization.

cost_7.label: Mighty Totem
cost_7.individual_traits: 3-4 pts Permanent Renown (may mix bonuses/penalties) + multiple Ability bonuses
cost_7.pack_traits: 4+ Willpower per story + unique power or restricted access (tribal Gifts)
cost_7.ban_severity: Strict - commands from the totem, constant obligations, lifestyle restrictions
cost_7.design_notes: These totems demand much but grant unique advantages. Uktena grants Gift access; Thunder issues commands. Coyote's mischief requirement can complicate serious situations.

cost_8_plus.label: Legendary Totem
cost_8_plus.pack_traits: 5+ Willpower per story + multiple strong powers or constant supernatural effects
cost_8_plus.design_notes: Reserved for chronicle-defining totems. The ban should meaningfully impact the pack's options in most situations.

ability_dot.effect: +1 to an Ability for all pack members (Individual Trait)

totem_speaks.effect: Totem can communicate clearly with pack

totem_finds.effect: Totem can always locate pack members

always_present.effect: Totem is always spiritually with pack (not just at caern)

spirit_respect.effect: Spirits of the totem's brood treat pack with respect

extra_charm.effect: Totem can use an additional Charm to aid pack

behavioral_bans.description: Pack must/must not behave certain ways

examples: Never eat the flesh of X
Never speak the name of Y
taboo_bans.severity: Variable (depends on how common the taboo situation is)

respect.typical_bans: Protect the weak, maintain honor, show mercy
respect.spirit_flavor: Noble animals (falcon, stag, unicorn), inspiring concepts

war.typical_bans: Never flee, never show cowardice, protect specific animals

wisdom.typical_bans: Seek knowledge, guard secrets, perform observances
wisdom.spirit_flavor: Mystical creatures (owl, chimera, serpent), night animals

cunning.typical_renown: Mixed (often has penalty to one type)
cunning.spirit_flavor: Trickster animals (coyote, fox, raven), survivors (rat, cockroach)

Falcon.ban: Never let a companion die in disgrace

pack: +2 Empathy, +2 Animal Ken (one at a time)
+1 Mental Attributes in wilderness (one at a time)
Berserker without frenzy (one at a time)
Mother's Touch Gift (one at a time)

custom_totem_checklist: Design Individual Traits: Permanent Renown (scaled to cost) + Attribute/Ability/difficulty modifier bonuses (all pack members)
Design Pack Traits: Willpower pool (scaled to cost) + powerful abilities with usage limitations (one pack member at a time)
Consider combat caution: Garou already have +4 Strength in Crinos; combat bonuses should be proportionate
Create thematically appropriate Ban (severity matches cost)
Describe totem's avatar appearance and personality
Define totem's brood (what lesser spirits serve it)
Verify total power level matches examples at same cost

Falcon.ban: Never let a companion die in disgrace

wyrm._note: Wyrm totems for Black Spiral Dancers. Use Infamy/Cunning/Power instead of Glory/Honor/Wisdom.

Whippoorwill.ban: Never reveal pack secrets to outsiders

Bat.ban: Hunt at night; sleep during day

Hakaken.ban: Accept any challenge to single combat

Dark Fungus.ban: Spread corruption; never allow clean growth

G'louogh.ban: Corrupt one spirit per lunar month

unique_mechanics.sacred_secret: Nagah existence is secret. Only Hengeyokai know. Mokolé suspect (no Mnesis of extinction).

ananta.description: Personal Umbral realm. Portable if dedicated to specific Nagah.
ananta.uses: Step sideways (only from Ananta or Serpent Waters), rest, communion.

wani.description: Dragon Kings, spirit patrons. Only spirits who know Sacred Secret.
wani.role: Teach Gifts (via servants), provide guidance. Replace traditional spirit pacts.

unique_mechanics.nests: Nomadic groups of 2-3 Nagah. Closer than family or lovers. Like Garou packs.
unique_mechanics.kinfolk_cults: Secret serpent-worshipping cults and assassin clans. Protect young Nagah, clean up evidence.
unique_mechanics.no_caerns: Nagah do not hold Caerns. Use Serpent Waters (aquatic glens) instead.
unique_mechanics.venom: All forms have venom. Aggravated damage.

balaram.notes: Human-born. Cold, analytical, hyper-vigilant from childhood.

ahi.notes: Nagah-Nagah offspring. No special stigma but rare.

vasuki.notes: Born from snake Kinfolk. Various species.

kamakshi.description: Seducers, spies. Gather information through charm.

kamsa.description: Judges, investigators. Determine guilt before execution.

balaram.notes: Human form. May be cold-blooded via Gift.

silkaram.notes: Near-human. Subtle serpentine features. Forked tongue, scales.

azhi_dahaka.notes: Crinos equivalent. Humanoid serpent. Causes Delirium.

kali_dahaka.notes: Giant snake with humanoid arms. Combat form.

samskara_rites.name: Rite of Bearing
samskara_rites.description: Funeral rite. Release spirit to Dragon Kings.

samskara_rites.name: Samskara of Shiva
samskara_rites.description: Execution rite. Formally condemn and execute target.

samskara_rites.name: Rite of the Sesha
samskara_rites.description: Commune with the nine ruling Nagah.

organization.sesha: Nine highest-ranking Nagah. Dwell in Nandana. Oversee all weresnakes.
organization.crowns: Regional councils of 3 high-ranking Nagah each.

special_rules.umbra_entry: Only from Ananta or Serpent Waters, or via Gift: Swimming the Spirit River.
special_rules.delirium: Azhi Dahaka and Kali Dahaka cause Delirium.
special_rules.secrecy: Must eliminate evidence of existence. Clean crime scenes. Silence witnesses.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 general + 1 breed + 1 auspice Gift at creation.

unique_mechanics.dodge_protection: Cannot botch Athletics rolls to dodge in combat.
unique_mechanics.no_regeneration: Kitsune do not regenerate. All non-bashing damage is lethal. Heal like mortals (but easier to heal with Gifts).
unique_mechanics.silver_vulnerability: Can attempt to soak silver (difficulty 8). Unsoaked = lethal.

tails.description: Gain one tail per rank (Rank 1 = 1 tail, etc.). Lifespan doubles per rank.
tails.visibility: Tails normally invisible. Gnosis roll vs Gauntlet to reveal/hide.
tails.nine_tails: Immortal. Only Bai Mianxi has achieved this.

unique_mechanics.koto_no_delirium: Koto (Crinos) form does NOT cause Delirium. Must hide from mortals.
unique_mechanics.umbra: Enter Umbra as easily as Garou.
unique_mechanics.gifts_from_others: Can learn other Changing Breeds' Gifts if taught. Same XP cost as non-breed Gift.
unique_mechanics.kitsune_go: Free native language combining body language, audio cues, proto-Japonic elements.
unique_mechanics.fox_frenzy: Always fox frenzy (flee), never berserk frenzy.

kojin.notes: Human-born. Always some Asian ancestry. Know they're special from childhood.

shinju.notes: Fox-Fox offspring. 10% chance to be shifter. 50% parent death chance each. No deformities.
shinju.special: No stigma. Raised in courts. Often arrogant perfectionists.

roko.notes: Fox-born. Curious, love new experiences. Discovery of human form is delight.

kataribe.description: Builders, doers, poets. Knowledge collectors. Most aligned with Beast Courts.

gukutsushi.description: Dreamweavers. Tricksters and healers. Mind-bending illusions.

doshi.description: Sorcerers. Magic and spirit communication. Hint of Yomi taint.
doshi.notes: Detect as slightly Wyrm-tainted on Sense Wyrm (diff 9).

eji.description: Warriors. Direct action, combat. Rarest path.

koto.notes: Crinos equivalent. Does NOT cause Delirium. Aggravated bite damage.

juko.notes: Wolf-sized fox. Travel form. Good 'manual' dexterity with mouth.

kyubi.notes: Normal fox. Mostly red pelts, some gray. Natural for roko.

ju_fu.description: Paper magic. Purchased at Level x 7 XP. Learned from other Kitsune, not spirits.
ju_fu.kami_cost: At least 1 Gnosis to create each kami (paper spell).

backgrounds.batsu: Allies equivalent. Friends and cohorts. Most have 3+ dots.
backgrounds.clan: Kinfolk equivalent. Family, Kin, trusted friends who know truth.
backgrounds.go_en: Contacts equivalent. Network of minor contacts. Difficulty 5 to find help.
backgrounds.sempai: Mentor equivalent. May be group or individual. Aunt/uncle, parent, sentai, Gai'nan.

rites.name: Rite of the Crossroads
rites.description: Determines Path. Performed when Kitsune reaches first rank. Reveals true essence.

special_rules.pure_breed_banned: Cannot take Pure Breed. All Kitsune are inherently special.
special_rules.no_rite_of_second_face: Cannot change Paths after Rite of Crossroads.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 general + 1 breed + 1 Path Gift at creation.
special_rules.hearing_bonus: -2 difficulty hearing Perception rolls (all forms except Hitogata).

overview.name: War Wolves
overview.purpose: Primary anti-Garou weapon, designed to hunt and kill Kinfolk
overview.creation_method: Genetic manipulation of humans merged with wolf DNA, forced Bane possession

traits.form_note: Cannot take Homid, Glabro, or Hispo forms

lupus_form.notes: Fast and agile, built for pursuit

strengths: Immune to silver (not true Garou)
Pack hunters - coordinate instinctively
Tireless pursuit
Track by scent across any distance
Cannot be affected by Gifts targeting 'Garou'
weaknesses: Cannot regenerate (heal as humans)
Limited intelligence in Crinos (bestial, follow simple orders only)
Cannot learn Gifts or rites
Sterile
Short lifespan (5-10 years)
Require regular 'treatments' from Pentex handlers

tactics: Focus on Kinfolk, avoid actual Garou when possible

deployment.targets: Kinfolk communities, isolated Garou, caern approaches
deployment.pentex_investment: Extremely expensive; each War Wolf represents millions in R&D

process: Human subject selected for physical fitness

horror_elements: Once were human - some have fragmented memories
Hunt Kinfolk families - target the innocent
Relentless pursuit - don't stop, don't sleep
Pack coordination is eerie, almost telepathic
encounter_hooks: War Wolf pack tracks party across state lines
Escaped War Wolf retains human memories, seeks help
Pentex facility raid reveals War Wolf breeding program
storytelling.threat_level: Individual War Wolf is threat to starting character; pack is threat to experienced pack

uses: 1 blood: Extra action in a turn
blood_pool.notes: Cannot boost Physical Attributes with blood. Cannot spend blood and Gnosis same turn (except for Gifts requiring both). Only one blood benefit per turn unless using Blood Pump Gift.

healing.aggravated: 5 blood total at 1/turn, heals when last point spent
healing.disease: Heal like aggravated (common=5 blood, serious=15-25 blood)
healing.notes: No regeneration otherwise - heal like normal humans.

unique_mechanics.no_rage: Ananasi do not possess Rage. Use blood pool instead.
unique_mechanics.no_frenzy: Cannot normally frenzy. +2 difficulty to supernaturally induce frenzy.
unique_mechanics.no_silver_vulnerability: Immune to silver allergy - proof of non-Gaian origin.

webs.pithus: Strength 9, 4 health levels. 1 blood = doorway-sized web.
webs.crawlerling: Normal spider web strength, no blood cost.

unique_mechanics.venom: All forms have venom (full strength in Pithus, diluted in Lilian). Aggravated damage, needs medical/magical healing.
unique_mechanics.sylie: Personal Umbral lair on the Great Web. Rest, meditation, commune with Ananasa.

homid.notes: Internal organs altered. Venom glands and vestigial fangs present.

restrictions: No starting Ability restrictions despite spider origin
arachnid.notes: Born as spiders. Quickly develop human-focused abilities.

tenere.description: Servants of the Weaver. Seek perfect order.

hatar.description: Servants of the Wyrm (as it was). Seek to restore Wyrm's true nature.

kumoti.description: Servants of the Wyld. Seek chaotic change and creativity.

myrmidon.description: Warriors. Martial combat, guerilla tactics, diplomacy, shock maneuvers.

viskr.description: Judges and mystics. Hidden knowledge, arcane magic, secrets.

wyrsta.description: Questioners. Test reality, manipulate, test other Damhàn.

homid.notes: Altered internal organs, venom glands, 8+ eyes not visible.

lilian.notes: Primary combat form. Human/giant spider hybrid. Causes full Delirium. +50% height/weight.

pithus.notes: Giant spider form. 500-700 lbs. Can produce steel-strength webs. Causes Delirium.

crawlerling.notes: Swarm of hundreds/thousands of normal spiders. Reformation from fewer causes memory/personality loss. Transformation causes Delirium.

rites.name: Rite of Spinning
rites.system: Creates complex webs for various purposes. Communion with Ananasa.

special_rules.gift_rage_substitution: Any Gift requiring Rage uses blood instead. Rage rolls use Gnosis.
special_rules.queen_ananasa_totem: All Damhàn automatically have Queen Ananasa as personal totem (free).
special_rules.shapeshifting: Stamina + Primal-Urge roll, or spend 1 blood for reflexive shift.
special_rules.umbra_entry: Can only enter Umbra from Sylie or using specific Gifts.
special_rules.peripheral_vision: Up to 240° in non-Homid forms (8 eyes).

fallen.name: Antara
corruption_causes: Chose the Wyrm aspect of Queen Ananasa over balance
Abandoned the Weaver-Wyrm balance for pure destruction
traits: Serve destruction and entropy over transformation
fallen.threat_level: Medium - dangerous due to infiltration capability and identical appearance to loyal Ananasi
fallen.redemption: Possible if they can re-embrace the balance of Ananasa's nature
fallen.detection: Extremely difficult - their powers and appearance are identical to regular Ananasi

restrictions: Cannot take Mentor after first year (exception: Bagheera)
Exception for Swara: may take Ancestors (represents land connection)

pryio.description: Personality indicator, can shift with life changes. Determines Willpower recovery trigger.

daylight.description: Open, direct, straightforward. Diplomats, warriors, lawgivers, protectors.
daylight.willpower_trigger: Face serious challenges head-on and win through courage or good nature.

twilight.description: Mysteries and magic, shades of grey. Detectives, lawyers, spies, mystics.
twilight.willpower_trigger: Solving mysteries, thinking rather than reacting, creating puzzles.

night.description: Sinister, hidden, withdrawn. Assassins, scholars, scientists, dark magic practitioners.
night.willpower_trigger: Activities causing others discomfort, protecting privacy, guarding secrets.

bagheera.notes: Indian mystic warriors. Maintain loose ties. Ojas Surge, Juddho form.

balam.notes: Central/South American. Ancient secret keepers. Can learn 'lost' Gifts/Rites.

bubasti.notes: Egyptian sorcerer-cats. Cat Magic merit. Can design unique spells.

ceilican.notes: Fae-touched. Can return to old personas. Hazy past-life memories.

khan.notes: Asian warrior kings. Cannot resist direct challenges.

qualmi.notes: Riddlers and mystics. Pacific Northwest. Love puzzles.

simba.notes: African kings. Arrogant, domineering. Live in prides. Caused Endless Storm.

swara.notes: African plains runners. Deep land connection. May take Ancestors (land, not spirits).

sokto.notes: Near-human. Lengthened limbs, claws, feline eyes.

crinos.notes: War form. Causes Delirium. Bipedal cat-humanoid.

chatro.notes: Near-cat form. Four-legged but larger. Good for combat/travel.

feline.notes: Cat form. Varies by tribe (tiger vs housecat). Natural form for feline breed.

special_rules.no_stepping_sideways: Bastet cannot step sideways without the Gift: Walking Between Worlds (Level 4).
special_rules.solitary: Most Bastet are solitary. Simba are exception (prides).
special_rules.den_realm: Umbral home territory staked out by powerful Bastet. Hard to create, violating is deadly crime.
special_rules.yava: Three secret weaknesses per tribe. Known only to that tribe and Nagah. Revealing = death.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 general, 1 breed, 1 tribe Gift at creation.
special_rules.rage_recovery: All Bastet regain 1 Rage each sunset.

fallen.name: Histpah (Liar-Kings)
corruption_causes: Consumed by forbidden secrets
Driven mad by knowledge they couldn't handle
Pacts with Maeljin Incarna for power
traits: May bargain with Maeljin Incarna directly
Often serve as information brokers for the Wyrm
Some command Banes as personal servants
fallen.threat_level: Medium - dangerous because they know too many secrets
fallen.redemption: Theoretically possible if the corrupting knowledge can be purged (extremely rare)

project_lycaon.overview: Pentex bioengineering project to create artificial shapeshifters
project_lycaon.goal: Counter the Changing Breeds with manufactured monsters
project_lycaon.success_rate: Varies by breed; overall approximately 40% survival to deployment

breeds_summary.name: Anurana
breeds_summary.special: Can breed true; vulnerable to pure water

breeds_summary.name: Samsa
breeds_summary.special: All suffer derangements; Cause Insanity power

breeds_summary.name: Yeren
breeds_summary.special: Can learn Gifts; pass as human; often infiltrate septs

all_mockeries: Short lifespan compared to true Fera

detection.yeren_exception: Blending Gift can mask this temporarily
detection.physical_tells: Varies by breed; some have no tells in human form

campaign_hooks: Protect Kinfolk from War Wolf packs
Expose Yeren infiltrator in the sept
Anurana population explosion in polluted river

birthing_plague.description: Transforms Kinfolk into Ratkin. Drives them mad with ancestral memories and spirit voices.
birthing_plague.madness: May fade to skewed sanity, or become permanent mental illness.

blood_memory.description: Racial memory connecting to ancestors and relatives.
blood_memory.system: Gnosis roll. Diff 6 simple tasks, Diff 9 for visions (+ 1 Gnosis). Successes = time depth.

unique_mechanics.three_forms: Only Homid, Crinos, Rodens. No Glabro or Hispo equivalents.

metis.notes: Metis Ratkin exist. Statistics not specified; use general metis rules.

rodens.notes: Rat-born. Same restrictions as lupus Garou.

tunnel_runner.description: Scouts, messengers, spies. Travel the hidden ways.
strengths: Shortcut: Find/create tunnels between points
Wanderlust Visions: Rat Totem guides when lost
weaknesses: Traveling Light: Below Rank 3, no Resources. Rank 3 max 2 dots Resources.

shadow_seer.description: Shamans. Spirit lore, rites, communication with urban spirits.
strengths: Spirits Speak to Me: Free Spirit Speech
Spirit Sight: 1 Gnosis to see Penumbra (blind in physical)
weaknesses: Disconnection: Botch Rage/Gnosis/WP = spirit world seems more real (1 scene)

knife_skulker.description: Assassins, negotiators, executioners. Stealth and subterfuge.
strengths: Contracts and Contacts: 3 free Contacts dots
Sense of Justice: +1 Rage witnessing injustice
weaknesses: Assassin's Code: Cannot be seen killing assassination target. No Cloak of Shadows kills.

warrior.description: Fighters, protectors. Personal combat and asymmetric warfare.
strengths: Pain Dagger: Know Rite of Pain-Dagger, start with 1 dot Fetish
Tough: +1 Bruised health level
weaknesses: Blood Lust: Rage roll difficulty always 5.

engineer.description: Scavengers and modifiers of technology. Weaver fascination/horror.
strengths: Jury Rig: 1 Gnosis + Int+Repair = create device from scraps (1 scene)
Clever Hands: -2 difficulty fine manipulation
weaknesses: With Genius Comes Madness: One of Curious/Absent-Minded/Delusions of Grandeur/Kleptomania

plague_lord.description: Masters of disease. Allied with plague/disease spirits.
strengths: Instinctive Medicine: 3 free Medicine dots
Spirit Ally: Plague spirit teaches Gifts and provides info
weaknesses: Servitor of Disease: Spirit demands services (spreading disease, experiments). Failure = friends sicken/die.

munchmausen.description: Delusional liars. Bring others into their delusions.
strengths: Beautiful Lie: 1/day, Manip+Expression = everyone believes elaborate lie (1 hr + 1/success)
Silver Tongue: 3 free Expression dots
weaknesses: Delusional: At least one firm delusion that cannot be disproven.

twitcher.description: Paranoid anarchists. Mindlessly violent, deeply paranoid.
strengths: Anonymity: Humans WP (diff 8) to remember. Non-pack Ratkin Gnosis (diff 8).
weaknesses: Impulse Control Problems: When regaining Rage, roll to gain more (diff 10-Rank). Keep rolling until full or fail.

crinos.notes: Rat-man. Causes Delirium. Only war form.

rodens.notes: Rat form. Natural for rodens breed.

rites.name: Rite of the Birthing Plague
rites.description: Infect Kinfolk with Birthing Plague to transform them.

rites.name: Rite of the Pain-Dagger
rites.description: Create Pain Dagger fetish. Warriors must know this.

organization.nests: Local groups. Welcome peaceful visitors, chase out threats.

special_rules.gifts_selection: Varies by Aspect. Usually 1-2 Aspect Gifts at creation.

fallen.name: Mad Destroyers
corruption_causes: Plague-madness
Apocalyptic fervor gone too far
Embracing annihilation over population control
traits: Spread disease indiscriminately - no concern for 'worthy' vs 'unworthy' targets
Seek to trigger the Apocalypse early
Work openly with Banes and Pentex
Lost the distinction between culling and genocide
fallen.redemption: Possible but rare - requires regaining the wisdom of controlled culling

metis.notes: Sterile but fully accepted. Higher rate of hermaphroditism as metis flaw.

hyaenid.notes: Traditional Kinfolk are spotted hyenas only.

dawn.description: Warriors and pack-leaders. Combative, easily-offended, hyperactive.

midnight.description: Balance. Stable, centered. Historically most common in males.

dusk.description: Shadow-stalkers. Subtle, patient, cunning. Best assassins and clan leaders.

homid.notes: Bristly-haired, stocky torso, long slim limbs. Unsettling cunning air.

anthros.notes: Hybrid human/hyena. Upright, thickened features, stronger musculature.

crinos.notes: Battle form. Invokes Delirium. Thick bristled fur.

crocas.notes: Primordial war-form. Barrel-chested, crushing jaws (+1 bite damage).

hyaenid.notes: Normal hyena. Endurance-based, best for movement.

accord.name: Song of Home
accord.system: Choose aspect (Remembrance/Restoration/Revenge). Success restores all Willpower/Gnosis/Rage respectively.

fetishes.name: Guidebook
fetishes.description: Travel guidebook with ancestor-spirit. -2 difficulty social/Streetwise to fit in.

fetishes.name: Vanity Mirror
fetishes.description: Forces viewers to stare at reflective surfaces for Gnosis turns unless they resist.

special_rules.rage_recovery: All Ajaba regain 2 Rage each sunrise.
special_rules.attitude_to_garou: Neutral/Hostile. Diaspora has scattered them, some work with Simba enemies.

overview.name: Yeren
overview.purpose: Corporate infiltration, long-term espionage, social manipulation
overview.creation_method: Genetic modification combining human and great ape DNA, psychological conditioning
overview.success_rate: Most successful Mockery Breed - majority survive creation and deployment

traits.form_note: Only two forms; can maintain human form indefinitely

human_form.notes: Appear completely normal; often attractive and charming

strengths: High intelligence maintained in both forms
Can learn Gifts (unique among Mockeries)
Pass as human indefinitely
Excel at corporate/social environments
Can form genuine social bonds (useful for infiltration)
Regenerate (slowly - 1 lethal per day, 1 bashing per hour)
weaknesses: Overconfident - often blow cover through arrogance
Wyrm-taint detectable by Gifts
Sterile
Compulsive need to climb corporate/social hierarchies
Ape-form is obvious Wyrm corruption

unique_gifts.name: Blending
unique_gifts.description: Appear completely human to supernatural senses. Lasts one scene. Hides Wyrm taint from casual observation.

unique_gifts.name: Corporate Intuition
unique_gifts.description: Instantly read social hierarchies and power structures. Gain +2 dice to navigate corporate/political environments.

unique_gifts.name: Ape's Fury
unique_gifts.description: Enter controlled combat state in ape-form. +2 Strength, +1 Stamina, no frenzy risk, maintain tactical thinking.

gifts.learnable: Can learn some standard Garou Gifts from Bane teachers, typically Ragabash and Homid gifts

human_form.note: Avoid combat; use social manipulation instead

cover_identities: HR directors (perfect for identifying Garou Kinfolk employees)
deployment.long_term_ops: Yeren operations typically span years or decades

sept_infiltration.danger: Some Yeren have successfully posed as Kinfolk or even Garou allies
method: May facilitate attacks or sabotage when ordered
sept_infiltration.detection: Sense Wyrm Gift reveals their nature; they use Blending to counter

personality: Ambitious - driven to succeed in any hierarchy
Patient - willing to spend years on an operation
Conflicted - some develop real attachments to targets
psychology.loyalty: Loyal to Pentex but primarily self-interested; may defect if better offer appears
psychology.breaking_point: Genuine emotional attachments can compromise operations

horror_elements: The ally who was always a spy
Years of friendship were all a lie
Reveal transforms trusted friend into monster
encounter_hooks: Sept discovers long-term ally is a Yeren
Yeren defector offers information in exchange for protection
Corporate investigation leads to Yeren nest
Yeren falls in love with target, torn loyalties
storytelling.threat_level: Low in direct combat; extremely high in long-term danger

template.name: [Human identity]
template.compromised: [Any genuine attachments that might affect loyalty]

rage_usage.strength_boost: 1 Rage = +1 Str (max 2x form's Str), lasts Rage turns
rage_usage.stamina_boost: 1 Rage = +1 Sta (max 2x form's Sta), lasts Rage turns
rage_usage.extra_health: Can spend Rage for temporary health levels (scene duration)
rage_usage.notes: Can combine Str/Sta boosts. More deliberate in combat than Garou.

frenzy.threshold: 5+ successes on Rage roll (difficulty 8) to frenzy
frenzy.behavior: Never flee. Stand and fight, charge enemies.
frenzy.thrall_threshold: 8+ successes for Thrall of the Wyrm. Cannot be offset with Willpower.

unique_mechanics.rage_recovery: Slower than Garou. Direct threats to lands/creatures restore Rage; insults do not.

advantages.adamant_will: +1 auto success on opposed Willpower for protection/defense. +2 difficulty for mind control/possession.
advantages.keen_smell: -2 difficulty Perception rolls involving smell (except Homid form).

bhernocht.trigger: Willingly fails/abandons duties = -1 WP + loses Adamant Will. WP drops 1/day until duty resumed.
bhernocht.result: If WP hits 0: profound depression, hibernation. Need Gift: Waken or sustained force to awaken.

ursine.notes: Bear-born. Retain bear parent's pigmentation in homid form.

auspices.description: Progressive through life. Can learn Gifts from experienced auspices.

arcas.description: First Change through Gallivant. Exploration, learning, questioning.

uzmati.description: Solitary travels, warrior phase. Battle music in spirit.
uzmati.notes: Those in conflict areas may stay here longer.

kojubat.description: Remembering and learning. History, songs, stories. Begin Lifework.

kieh.description: Reflection, mysticism. Rites, Gifts, spirit knowledge. Many become Buri-Jaan.

rishi.description: Final progression. Wisdom, guidance. Judge disputes, mediate.
rishi.notes: Council of Autumn members often Rishi.

tribes.ice_stalkers: Polar regions. Polar bears. Harsh survival.
tribes.mountain_guardians: Asian. Pandas, Asiatic black bears. Mountain protectors.

homid.notes: Indistinguishable from human. Above average height/musculature. Rich voice.

arthren.notes: Near-man. Wild mountain man appearance. Intimidating but no Delirium. Human speech.

crinos.notes: 14-16 feet, 1+ ton. Causes Delirium. 9-inch claws. Thick fur armor. Monosyllables only.

bjornen.notes: Cave-bear. Four feet preferred. Instinctual thinking. Gurahl tongue only.

ursus.notes: Normal bear appearance. Bear language + limited Gurahl tongue. Bear mindset.

rites.name: Rite of Rending the Gauntlet
rites.description: Enter Umbra in Bjornen form. Tear hole in Gauntlet. Causes Delirium. Only Gurahl can use rift.

rites.name: Rite of Fighting the Death Bear
rites.description: Return the dead to life. Must wrestle Mangi.

special_rules.mentor_required: All Gurahl must begin with at least 1 dot in Mentor.
special_rules.umbra_entry: Only via Rite of Rending the Gauntlet or specific Gifts.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 breed + 1 auspice (Arcas at start) + 1 general Gift.

unique_mechanics.all_ragabash: Luna sees all Nuwisha as Ragabash (ancient trick by Coyote). Learn Ragabash Gifts. Rank as Ragabash.
unique_mechanics.humor_renown: Humor replaces Honor in Renown tracking.
unique_mechanics.hundred_limit: Only 100 Nuwisha can exist in physical world at once. Rest in Umbral Danse.
unique_mechanics.umbral_danse: Werecoyotes who leave physical world join the Umbral Danse (eternal spirit journey).

faces_of_coyote.description: Personal totems representing aspects of Coyote. Each has unique benefits and bans.
faces_of_coyote.notes: Only Ptah followers can perform Rite of Dansing.

unique_mechanics.teachers_not_murderers: Pranks teach lessons. May be deadly, but have purpose.

homid.notes: Clowns, show-offs, eccentrics as children. First Change brings understanding of purpose.

latrani.notes: Coyote-born. More common than lupus Garou. Curious and playful.

coyote.description: The great trickster. Teaches painful lessons.
coyote.ban: Must always play a trick on Garou when meeting them.

kishijoten.description: Gentleness and healing. Humor for comfort.
kishijoten.ban: Must always stop to help injured (except Wyrm followers).

loki.description: Liesmith, war spirit. Lessons written in blood.
loki.bonuses: +1 Bruised health level, +1 any Physical Attribute (can exceed 5)
loki.ban: Must accept formal challenges. Offer kills to Loki.

oghma.description: Bard, scholar. Gentle humiliation teacher. CANNOT BE CHOSEN - Oghma chooses followers.
oghma.bonuses: +5 Willpower per story. In formal contests: +5 Mental OR +4 Physical (temporary)

ptah.description: Wisdom, mysteries, mystical travel. Most popular. All Umbral Dansers follow Ptah.
ptah.bonuses: -3 Gauntlet difficulty. Can perform Rite of Dansing. Free Sense Wyrm in Umbra. Slow aging in Umbra.

raven.description: Knowledge, observation. Often walk among Garou disguised.
raven.ban: Cannot carry wealth. Trust Raven to provide.

ti_malice.description: Lying, theft, treachery. Wreck harmful corporations.
ti_malice.ban: Show no mercy to the weak, especially in business.

xochipilli.description: Chance, risk. Joy in near-death experiences.
xochipilli.bonuses: +3 Survival. +5 soak dice for outrageous dangerous stunts (must be unlikely to survive).
xochipilli.ban: Cannot turn away from dares, even suicidal ones.

homid.notes: Human form. Any ethnicity now (originally Native American). Scrawny, trail-worn.

tsitsu.notes: Near-human. +inches height, +10-20 lbs muscle. Less hairy than Glabro. Fairly human, easy speech.

manabozho.notes: Crinos. ~8 feet, 2.5x mass. Deep gravelly voice. REDUCED Delirium (+2 to victim's Willpower).

sendeh.notes: Like extinct red wolf. Larger than coyote, smaller than grey wolf. Can mimic sounds but not speech.

latrani.notes: Normal coyote. Natural form for latrani breed.

rites.name: Rite of Dansing
rites.description: Enter the Umbral Danse. Only Ptah followers can perform.

special_rules.ragabash_gifts: Can learn all Ragabash Garou Gifts.
special_rules.homid_gifts: Homid Nuwisha can learn homid Garou Gifts.
special_rules.latrani_gifts: Latrani Nuwisha can learn lupus Garou Gifts.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 breed Gift + 2 general Nuwisha Gifts at creation.
special_rules.reduced_delirium: Manabozho form: treat victim's Willpower as 2 higher.

fallen.name: Bitter-Grins (Nokhomi)
corruption_causes: Despair - found the joke wasn't funny anymore
Cruelty replacing humor
Lost faith in lessons teaching anything
traits: Dark tricksters whose pranks cause real, lasting harm
Serve twisted Coyote-aspects instead of true Coyote
Pranks have lethal consequences rather than teaching lessons

twisted_totems.Skulker-in-Darkness: Paranoid Coyote - teaches fear, not cleverness
twisted_totems.Eater-of-the-Dead: Coyote as carrion feeder - teaches despair
twisted_totems.Laughing-at-Corpses: Nihilistic Coyote - teaches that nothing matters

fallen.threat_level: Medium - unpredictable, pranks can be devastating
fallen.redemption: Possible if they can remember why the jokes were supposed to help

unique_mechanics.immortality: Rokea cease aging at adulthood. Careful Rokea are practically immortal.
unique_mechanics.gnosis_recovery: Must be at least partially immersed in SALT water. Can recover from grottoes or Rorqual.

sending.range: Half mile in water. ~50 feet on land.
sending.notes: All Rokea in range perceive. Cannot produce in Homid form. Free communication with undersea spirits.

kunmind.frenzy_threshold: 2+ successes = frenzy (never flee, stand and fight).
kunmind.kunmind_threshold: 4+ successes = Kunmind (Thrall of Wyrm equivalent). Attack anything, try to eat, no friend/foe distinction.

unique_mechanics.movement_compulsion: Hate confinement. Must pace on land (WP diff 6 to resist). Grappled/restrained = immediate frenzy check.
unique_mechanics.betweeners: Rokea who live on land. Controversial. Dimwater Rokea hunt them.
unique_mechanics.same_bito: Eastern Rokea (Beast Courts). Only source of homid Rokea.

homid.notes: Exceedingly rare. Only among Same-Bito. First Change at similar age to werewolves.

squamus.notes: Vast majority. Born of sharks. Only breed with deadliest shark species.

brightwaters.description: Consummate warriors. Prefer sea surface. Most betweeners come from here.

dimwater.birth: Cloudy days or night (except new/full moon)
dimwater.description: Most common. Natural leaders. Explorers. Strongest proponents of hunting betweeners.

darkwater.description: Rarest. Innovative, curious, calmest. Interested in extreme exploration.

homid.notes: Squat, coarse-featured human. Ethnicity matches area of first emergence (Same-Bito match parent).

glabrus.notes: Similar to Glabro. +inches height, 2x weight. Huge, ugly, muscular. First hints of dorsal fin. Bite diff 5 = lethal Str damage. REDUCED Delirium (+2 WP).
glabrus.special: Must learn on land. Not automatic.

gladius.notes: 10+ feet. Monstrous humanoid shark. Bite = Str+1 aggravated. Full Delirium.

chasmus.notes: Preferred combat form. +50% length (20ft shark = 30ft Chasmus). Bite = Str+2 aggravated. Full Delirium.

squamus.notes: Normal (large) shark. Natural for squamus. Only 20% of shark species represented: biggest, fiercest, most predatory.
Normal shark stats. Breed form for squamus.

rites.name: Rite of Passing the Net
rites.description: Enter Umbra from grotto. Must ask Sea's permission. Grants 28 days in Umbra.

rites.name: Sea's Distant Voice
rites.description: Send tales of deeds to Sea. Gain/lose Harmony and Innovation Renown.

rites.name: Lure of Sea
rites.description: Item from victim compels them to return to Sea within lunar month.

organization.grotto: Sacred underwater site. Like a caern.

special_rules.spirit_perception: Can perceive undersea spirits without Gift.
special_rules.umbra_entry: Cannot step sideways normally. Need Rite of Passing the Net or Gift: Enter Sea's Soul.
special_rules.regeneration: Same as Garou in non-breed forms. Squamus can regenerate in salt water.
special_rules.silver_vulnerability: Same as Garou (all forms except breed form for squamus).
special_rules.delirium: Gladius and Chasmus cause full Delirium. Glabrus causes reduced Delirium.
special_rules.renown_earning: Sea and Kun bestow Harmony/Innovation. Valor must be recognized by non-slew Rokea.
special_rules.no_rank_challenges: Reach requisite Renown = automatic rank advancement.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 general + 1 auspice Gift at creation (breed Gifts are same as breed form species).

fallen.name: Balefire Sharks
corruption_causes: Radiation absorption from nuclear waste
Contact with deep-sea Wyrm entities
Corruption by undersea Banes
traits: Immune to radiation - it's a source of power
Seek out nuclear waste dumping sites
May attack nuclear vessels to spread contamination
Some have grown to massive sizes from radiation exposure

radiation_mechanics.presence: Causes radiation sickness in nearby mortals

fallen.threat_level: Very High - radiation damage, massive size, amphibious
fallen.redemption: Nearly impossible - the radiation is integrated into their being

mnesis.description: Racial memory. Dream of ancestors' experiences.
mnesis.background: Mnesis rating determines depth/clarity of memories.
mnesis.uses: Learn ancient knowledge, remember extinct languages, recall prehistoric events.

archid_characteristics.description: Custom war form built from Gnosis points.
archid_characteristics.evolution: If Gnosis increases, may add new characteristics.

unique_mechanics.no_standard_umbra: Except Gumagan, cannot enter Umbra without Gifts. May access Astral Umbra via spirit-paths.
unique_mechanics.gold_and_silver: Vulnerable to BOTH gold and silver (like Garou to silver).
unique_mechanics.sun_connection: Cannot recover Gnosis if cut off from sun. Less sun = more meditation needed.
unique_mechanics.dragons_tongue: Instinctive common language shared by all Mokolé.
unique_mechanics.no_metis: Metis conceived but die before birth (see: The Innocents).

gumagan.special: Can enter Umbra. Start with Gills characteristic free.

homid.notes: Ethnicity usually matches stream. End Times awakening unexpected bloodlines.

suchid.notes: Hatched from reptile egg. Direct, self-interested reputation.

rising_sun.benefit: Reroll initiative once per scene (must use second result).
rising_sun.description: Soldiers, hunters, explorers. Live for the moment.

noonday_sun.benefit: Once/scene, -1 die from creature of darkness (vampires, fomori, etc.).
noonday_sun.description: Judges, enforcers, guards. Laws of the Sun.

setting_sun.benefit: +1 die when defending others, retreating, or following orders (once/scene).

midnight_sun.benefit: +1 die from ST when bringing humor/courage in hopeless situation.
midnight_sun.description: Poets, jokers, artists, guides to dead. Paradox-lovers.

decorated_sun.benefit: Once/scene when organizing others or during formal court matters.

eclipsed_sun.description: Ruler-priests. All Mokolé defer to them. Expected to aid those in need.

grisma.description: Judges, police. Seek truth and justice.

vasanta.description: Warriors, travelers. Most open to new things.

archid.notes: Draconic form. Custom via Archid Characteristics. Causes Delirium. Aggravated bite/claw (Str+2).

suchid.notes: Reptile form. Stats vary by varna.

special_rules.shifting: Stamina + Primal-Urge (diff 6). Homid↔Suchid = 2 successes. To/from Archid = 1. Spend Rage for instant shift.
special_rules.gifts_selection: 1 breed + 1 auspice + 1 general Gift at creation.

fallen.name: Mnetics (Eaters of Secrets)
corruption_causes: Memory corruption from touching forbidden knowledge
Despair at loss of so many kin in the Wars
Wyrm corruption of Mnesis itself
traits: Twisted Mnesis that serves the Wyrm
May 'remember' false histories and implant them in others
Seek to corrupt the collective Memory of the Mokole
Ultimate goal: make all Mokole forget Gaia entirely
fallen.threat_level: Very High - threatens Mokole racial memory itself
fallen.redemption: Theoretically possible but the corrupted memories make it nearly impossible
fallen.special_danger: If they corrupt enough of Mnesis, the true history of the world could be lost

unique_mechanics.ravens_gifts: +1 Subterfuge, +1 Enigmas, +1 Dodge (free at creation, all Corax)
unique_mechanics.silver_immunity: Corax are immune to silver. Helios's gift.
unique_mechanics.gold_vulnerability: Gold affects Corax in feathered forms as silver affects Garou.

eye_drinking.description: Can drink from corpse's eye to see victim's last sight.
eye_drinking.system: Perception + Empathy (difficulty 7). Left eye = negative consequences of death. Right eye = positive outcomes. Can only drink one eye per corpse.

flight.corvid_bonus: Corvids get 2 free dots in Hobby Talent: Flight.
flight.homid_restriction: Homids cannot buy Flight at creation except with freebies.

compulsions.secrets: Cannot resist sharing information. May cause trouble.
compulsions.shinies: Willpower roll (difficulty 7) to look away from shiny objects.

unique_mechanics.delicate_bones: -1 difficulty Athletics, +2 difficulty soak bashing damage (all forms).

restrictions: Cannot buy Hobby Talent: Flight at creation except with freebies
Cannot buy Computer, Law, Linguistics, Medicine, Politics, Science at creation except with freebies
corvid.notes: Cliquish, talkative. First Change at 8-10 months. Extended lifespan (human normal).

crinos.notes: Humanoid raven. Can fly. Can speak. Causes Delirium.

corvid.notes: Raven form. Natural form for corvid breed.

rites.name: Spirit Egg Rite
rites.description: Creates Corax. Ties fetish egg to potential shifter's spirit.

rites.name: Rite of the Sun's Bright Ray
rites.description: Borrow sunlight to illuminate area for hour/success.

rites.name: Rite of the Fetish Egg
rites.description: Create fetish egg for Spirit Egg Rite.

rites.name: Rite of Memory Theft
rites.description: Sing away another Corax's deeds. Costs Gnosis, Willpower, Rage.

factions.chasers: Young murder investigating supernatural. Fun but dangerous.
factions.leshy: Russian. Bald in homid (missing one ear). Paranoid. Forest-dwelling. 3/4 corvid.
factions.hermetic_order_swift_light: Business arm. Madison Avenue, NYC. Deliveries and secrets for hire.

special_rules.no_tribes: Corax have no tribes. Unified Gift list.
special_rules.no_metis: No metis Corax. Corax-Corax offspring are normal (cannot become Corax).
special_rules.creation: Corax are 'made' via Spirit Egg Rite, not born.
special_rules.three_forms: Only three forms: Homid, Crinos, Corvid.
special_rules.gifts_selection: Homids choose 3 from homid list. Corvids choose 3 from corvid list.

fallen.name: Buzzards (Raven's Lost Children)
corruption_causes: Despair at world's suffering
Sold secrets to Wyrm for power
Tortured and broken by Black Spirals
traits: Still gather secrets, but now serve the Wyrm
Corrupted Spirit Sight - sees only suffering and despair
Raven has denied them; they serve lesser Wyrm-spirits instead
fallen.redemption: Theoretically possible but requires Raven's forgiveness (rarely given)

Alpha.description: You are a natural leader, dominant and decisive
Alpha.regain_willpower: When the pack succeeds due to your guidance

Architect.description: You create things of lasting value
Architect.regain_willpower: When you create something of lasting significance

Autocrat.description: You must be in charge; your way is the only way
Autocrat.regain_willpower: When you dominate others to achieve your goals

Big Bad Wolf.description: You revel in being a predator, instilling fear
Big Bad Wolf.regain_willpower: When you terrify or intimidate others successfully

Bon Vivant.description: Life is to be enjoyed to its fullest
Bon Vivant.regain_willpower: When you truly enjoy yourself and help others do the same

Bravo.description: Might makes right; you solve problems with force
Bravo.regain_willpower: When you overwhelm opposition through strength

Caregiver.regain_willpower: When you successfully protect or nurture someone

Celebrant.description: You exist for your passion and cause
Celebrant.regain_willpower: When you further your cause significantly

Competitor.description: You must be the best; second place is losing
Competitor.regain_willpower: When you win a competition or prove superiority

Conformist.description: You follow the group and support leaders
Conformist.regain_willpower: When the group achieves something due to your support

Conniver.description: You achieve your goals through manipulation
Conniver.regain_willpower: When you manipulate others to your advantage

Cub.description: You need guidance and protection from others
Cub.regain_willpower: When someone helps you because they want to

Curmudgeon.description: Everything has a flaw; nothing is perfect

Deviant.description: You exist outside normal rules and expectations

Director.description: You take charge and organize others

Fanatic.description: Your cause is everything; you will die for it
Fanatic.regain_willpower: When you advance your cause regardless of cost

Gallant.description: You are flamboyant, stylish, the center of attention
Gallant.regain_willpower: When you impress others with your style

Gambler.description: You take risks; life is a game
Gambler.regain_willpower: When a risky gamble pays off

Idealist.description: You believe in higher goals and strive for them

Judge.description: You evaluate others and situations fairly
Judge.regain_willpower: When you make a just decision that affects others

Martyr.description: You suffer so others don't have to

Masochist.description: You test your limits through suffering

Monster.description: You embrace your predatory nature fully
Monster.regain_willpower: When you frighten or dominate prey

Pedagogue.description: You teach others and share knowledge
Pedagogue.regain_willpower: When others learn from your teaching

Penitent.description: You have sinned and must atone
Penitent.regain_willpower: When you make amends for past wrongs

Perfectionist.description: Nothing is good enough; everything can be better

Predator.description: The strong survive by consuming the weak

Rogue.description: You look out for yourself first

Soldier.description: You serve a cause or leader faithfully
Soldier.regain_willpower: When your service furthers the cause

Survivor.description: You will endure no matter what
Survivor.regain_willpower: When you survive against the odds

Thrill-Seeker.description: You live for excitement and danger
Thrill-Seeker.regain_willpower: When you face danger for the thrill

Traditionalist.description: The old ways are best; change is dangerous

Trickster.description: You find humor in everything; nothing is sacred
Trickster.regain_willpower: When your tricks succeed or amuse

Visionary.description: You see what could be, not what is
Visionary.regain_willpower: When you bring your vision closer to reality

standard_deformities.note: From W20 core. Every metis must have one deformity.

Albino.effect: +1 difficulty to sight-based Perception in bright light

Blind.effect: Cannot see; +2 difficulty to most physical actions

Fits.effect: Gnosis roll (diff 8) in stressful situations or suffer seizure

Hairless.effect: Social penalties among Garou; cold vulnerability

Horns.effect: Cannot hide nature; may use as weapon (Str+1 bashing)

No Claws.effect: Claw attacks do bashing instead of lethal/aggravated

No Tail.effect: -2 dice to balance-related Athletics rolls in wolf forms

Seizures.effect: Stamina roll (diff 8) when stressed or incapacitated 1 turn

Tough Hide.effect: +1 soak in all forms, but obvious non-human appearance

Weak Immune System.effect: +2 difficulty to resist disease and poison

Barred Shape.description: Cannot assume one form (player's choice, not Crinos or breed form)
Barred Shape.effect: Permanently locked out of one form. Cannot shift into it under any circumstances.
Barred Shape.notes: Common choices: Glabro (can't blend as near-human), Hispo (loses war-wolf mobility)

Brittle Claws and Fangs.description: Natural weapons are fragile and prone to breaking
Brittle Claws and Fangs.effect: On a botched claw/bite attack, claws or fangs break. -1 die to claw/bite damage until fully healed (one day).

Eyes of Darkness.description: Eyes are solid black with no visible whites or iris
Eyes of Darkness.effect: +1 difficulty to non-Intimidation social rolls with humans due to unsettling appearance
Eyes of Darkness.notes: May provide minor benefit to Intimidation at ST discretion

Hip Dysplasia.description: Malformed hip joints causing chronic pain and mobility issues
Hip Dysplasia.effect: -1 to running speed in all forms. -1 die to Athletics rolls involving legs (running, jumping, kicking).
Hip Dysplasia.notes: Common in wolves bred for certain traits; ironic for Garou

Hirsute.description: Excessive hair growth in all forms, even Homid
Hirsute.effect: +1 difficulty to hiding Garou nature in human society. In Homid, visibly abnormal body hair.
Hirsute.notes: Hair grows back within hours if shaved

Monstrous.description: Horrifying appearance beyond normal Crinos terror
Monstrous.effect: Delirium effect increased by one level. +1 difficulty to non-Intimidation social rolls with anyone.
Monstrous.notes: Even other Garou find the metis disturbing

Musk.description: Produces strong, uncontrollable scent in all forms
Musk.effect: +2 difficulty to Stealth rolls where scent matters. Can be tracked at -2 difficulty.
Musk.notes: Scent may be animalistic, chemical, or simply unpleasant

Nervous Transformation.description: Involuntary partial shifts when startled or stressed
Nervous Transformation.effect: When surprised or frightened, Stamina roll (diff 7) or partially shift (ears, tail, claws, etc.). Potential Veil breach.
Nervous Transformation.notes: Common triggers: loud noises, sudden touches, bad news

No Fangs.effect: Bite attacks deal bashing damage only. Cannot use bite in Crinos effectively.
No Fangs.notes: Different from No Claws; can have one, the other, or both

No Muscle Mass.effect: -1 Strength in all forms (minimum 1). Cannot raise Strength above 3 without supernatural means.
No Muscle Mass.notes: Metis appears thin and weak even in Crinos

Slow Healer.effect: Heal at half normal Garou rate (round down). Aggravated damage takes twice as long.

Spiritual Deformity.description: Deformity exists on spiritual level, visible in Umbra
Spiritual Deformity.effect: -1 die to social rolls with spirits. Deformity visible to anyone using spirit sight.
Spiritual Deformity.notes: May appear as shadow-self corruption, missing spiritual limb, or aura distortion

Third Eye.description: Functional third eye in unusual location (forehead, palm, back of head)
Third Eye.effect: +1 Perception in some situations (ST discretion). Social penalty with those who notice.
Third Eye.notes: Eye is fully functional and reacts to light/stimulus

Unnaturally Colored Hide.description: Fur/hair in impossible colors (purple, neon green, etc.)
Unnaturally Colored Hide.effect: Cannot hide Garou nature in wolf forms. In Homid, hair color is equally unnatural.
Unnaturally Colored Hide.notes: Dyeing is temporary; natural color grows back within hours

Weak Voice.effect: -2 dice to all howl-based Gifts and rite components. Difficult to call for help or participate in group howls.
Weak Voice.notes: May sound strangled, whispered, or simply wrong

selection_guidelines.must_be_visible: Deformity should be apparent in at least one form, preferably breed form
selection_guidelines.cannot_be_purely_beneficial: Even Tough Hide has social drawback
selection_guidelines.multiple_deformities: Some metis have more than one (Flaw: Additional Deformity)

metis_camps.note: Political and social groupings for metis characters seeking identity and community

Followers of Vulcan.description: Metis who embrace crafting and creation, proving worth through building rather than destroying
Followers of Vulcan.philosophy: If we cannot be born pure, we will create purity. Our hands shape what our blood cannot.
Followers of Vulcan.reputation: Respected for utility; still stigmatized for birth
Followers of Vulcan.recruiting: Seek out metis with aptitude for crafts, especially those rejected by warrior roles

Children of Kubera.description: Metis who focus on wealth accumulation and material resources to gain status denied by birth
Children of Kubera.philosophy: Gold speaks louder than blood. Let them sneer at our birth while they beg for our resources.
Children of Kubera.reputation: Grudging respect from pragmatists; seen as grasping by traditionalists
Children of Kubera.recruiting: Metis with business acumen or access to Kinfolk wealth
Children of Kubera.notes: Named for Hindu god of wealth; predominantly found in urban septs

Sisterhood of Bes.description: Female metis protective society focused on safeguarding the young, especially metis cubs
Sisterhood of Bes.philosophy: We were not protected, so we will protect. No cub suffers alone while we draw breath.
activities: Mentor young metis through First Change
Sisterhood of Bes.reputation: Beloved by those they protect; seen as troublemakers by abusive elders
Sisterhood of Bes.recruiting: Female metis with protective instincts; occasional non-metis allies
Sisterhood of Bes.notes: Named for Egyptian protector god of households and children. Accept male allies but leadership is female metis only.

Society of Erichthonius.description: Scholarly metis who preserve forbidden knowledge and serve as loremasters
Society of Erichthonius.philosophy: What is forbidden to speak may still be written. What is lost can be found. Knowledge outlasts prejudice.
Society of Erichthonius.reputation: Invaluable for knowledge; distrusted for what they know
Society of Erichthonius.recruiting: Metis with scholarly bent and patience for research
Society of Erichthonius.notes: Named for the half-serpent king of Athens who was hidden in shame but rose to rule. Members often know secrets that could destroy reputations.

joining_requirements.general: Must be metis (exception: some allies in Sisterhood of Bes)
joining_requirements.initiation: Varies by camp; usually involves proving commitment to camp philosophy
joining_requirements.secrecy: Camp membership may be open or hidden depending on sept attitudes

camp_relationships.with_tribes: Camps cross tribal lines; a Silver Fang metis and Bone Gnawer metis may share camp despite tribal enmity
