camp_relationships.with_septs: Some septs tolerate or encourage camps; others forbid 'metis cabals'
camp_relationships.between_camps: Generally cooperative; shared experience of stigma unites them

story_hooks: Camp asks PC to shelter an abused metis cub
Society of Erichthonius has information PC needs but demands dangerous favor
Children of Kubera offer funding but want voting rights at sept
Followers of Vulcan's new fetish has unexpected side effects
Sisterhood of Bes accuses respected elder of cub abuse

taint_overview.definition: Wyrm taint is spiritual corruption that marks individuals and locations as touched by the Wyrm
taint_overview.detection: Sense Wyrm Gift detects taint; stronger taint is easier to detect

levels.name: Consumed
levels.description: Wyrm is dominant aspect; nearly irredeemable

path_of_corruption.description: How the Wyrm recruits servants gradually

stages.name: The Compromise
stages.method: Asks for something slightly wrong in return

stages.name: The Debt
stages.method: Now you owe them; favors escalate

stages.name: The Revelation
stages.method: True nature revealed; too late to easily escape

stages.name: The Service
stages.method: Full servant of Wyrm; no easy return

urge_wyrm_whispers.description: The tainted hear their patron Urge Wyrm
effects: Impulses aligned with Urge Wyrm's domain
Dreams of serving the Wyrm
Compulsions during stress
Paranoia about being discovered

greater_cleansing.limitation: Extremely traumatic; target may not survive

redemption_paths.black_spiral_dancers: Impossible - walking the Spiral is irreversible
redemption_paths.fomori: Possible if Bane is exorcised; host may not survive; taint remains
redemption_paths.willing_servants: Possible with extreme effort; requires genuine desire to change
redemption_paths.accidental_taint: Relatively easy with rites and time
redemption_paths.fallen_fera: Theoretically possible but nearly unheard of

failed_cleansing: Physical harm to target and participants

effects: Gauntlet thickens or thins unpredictably
Animals are sickly or aggressive
Plants grow wrong
Mortals feel uneasy
Banes are drawn to the area
blighted_areas.cleansing: Requires extended rites, purification of physical pollution, and possibly destruction of spiritual anchors

combat_healing_variant.description: Simplified combat healing that removes per-round Stamina rolls
combat_healing_variant.standard_rules_replaced: W20 p.258 combat regeneration requiring reflexive Stamina roll difficulty 8 each round

automatic_healing.rule: Each round in combat, a Garou automatically heals one level of bashing or lethal damage. No roll required.
automatic_healing.effect: Makes werewolves tougher, removes risk of healing dysfunction from botched rolls

new_system.effect: Regenerate 2 health levels per turn for a number of turns equal to successes rolled
new_system.aggravated_option: May trade 2 successes and 1 turn of normal healing to heal 1 level of aggravated damage instead
new_system.limitation: Cannot heal silver-inflicted aggravated damage this way

combat_healing_variant.recommendation: Use if extra rolling slows combat too much. Note this makes werewolves noticeably more durable.

healing_dysfunction.description: When a werewolf's regeneration becomes overwhelmed and slows to breed-form rate
triggers: Botch on Stamina roll to heal
Take more aggravated damage than Homid-form Stamina in a short period

effect.description: Body becomes overwhelmed, confused, slows regeneration to breed form healing rate (no faster than human/wolf)
effect.danger: Terrible in battle - one of the most dangerous moments for any Garou
effect.psychological: Often shakes self-confidence; first experience of healing dysfunction can be traumatic

healing_dysfunction.duration: Typically resolves within 10 minutes to 1 hour

tactical_implications.experienced_packs: Learn utility of harrying, in-and-out fighting in Hispo form
tactical_implications.hispo_advantages: Damage second only to Crinos, can quickly retreat to periphery to heal undisturbed
tactical_implications.young_garou: Often favor headlong Crinos charges; learn caution after first healing dysfunction

battle_scars.description: Permanent injuries from trauma that exceeded regeneration capacity
causes: Massive aggravated trauma while pushing through with Rage
Damage so severe the body prioritizes survival over proper repair

mechanism.description: Body takes emergency measures - fuses bones/ligaments rather than properly straightening and reweaving, pulls face together to keep brain in rather than careful reconstruction, seals stump when limb won't regrow
mechanism.template_integration: Scar becomes part of regeneration 'template' - body considers it the new normal

removal.difficulty: Requires healing magic as potent as the trauma that produced the scar

psychological_impact.mark_of_distinction: Battle scars are respected among Garou
psychological_impact.sense_of_betrayal: Those who suffer them often feel betrayed by their body
psychological_impact.sobering_realization: Discovery that even werewolf regeneration has limits

severed_limbs.description: Rules for limb loss and regrowth

possible_if: Garou can rest and focus on healing

severed_limbs.timeline: Variable - days to weeks depending on circumstances
severed_limbs.notes: Most permanent limb losses result from silver or circumstances forcing the body to prioritize staying alive over proper regrowth

partial_transformation.description: Ability to shift only parts of the body
use_cases: Manifest claws while otherwise in Homid
Sharpen senses without full form change
Grow fangs for a bite attack
partial_transformation.difficulty: Requires control and practice; young Garou struggle
partial_transformation.veil_risk: Can breach the Veil if witnessed

berserk_frenzy.description: Standard frenzy - goal is to destroy anger's target
berserk_frenzy.experience: Every sinew strains, labored breathing from Rage trying to escape body, laser-sharp focus on next victim
berserk_frenzy.behavior: Cannot see anyone but target; only after killing can move to next hapless soul

fox_frenzy.experience: Mind turns inward in fear, panicky feeling suffuses muscles, twitchy sudden movements
fox_frenzy.behavior: Only goal is escape; will attack obstacles but to remove them, not necessarily kill
fox_frenzy.tells: Movement departure from typical wolf grace - more like staggering junkie

thrall_of_the_wyrm.description: Most horrific - Wyrm facet takes over completely
thrall_of_the_wyrm.experience: Complete blackout. Werewolf has no control, no memory during. Afterwards: disjointed nightmare flashes over hours/days
thrall_of_the_wyrm.aftermath: Typically covered in gore/fluids. Deep dull hollowness in stomach. Quiet part of brain that suggests some part liked it.

_meta.description: Blood Sorcery content from Lore of the Clans and V20 Companion
_meta.source: V20 Lore of the Clans, V20 Companion
_meta.note: Includes Tremere Thaumaturgy rituals, Lasombra Abyss Mysticism, and Assamite Dur-An-Ki

Ascension of the Blood.name: Ascension of the Blood
Ascension of the Blood.description: Purify blood to prevent or weaken blood bonds. Identical to the Giovanni Necromancy ritual.
Ascension of the Blood.system: Requires 1 hour ritual with blood sample. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 7). Success purifies the blood, preventing it from creating or strengthening blood bonds for one night per success.
Ascension of the Blood.components: Grave dirt, salt, the blood to be purified

Vitality Hack.name: Vitality Hack
Vitality Hack.description: Display standard vital signs on medical equipment (EKG, CAT scan, thermometers, stethoscopes) without creating actual physical effects like pulse or bleeding. Signs displayed are uniform with no variance.
Vitality Hack.system: Requires 1 hour to cast. Remains in effect for scene duration, fooling all medical devices. Can alternatively be cast on a talisman (additional hour) that confers this effect to any Kindred carrying or touching it.
Vitality Hack.components: One ounce of blood from a living relative of the caster
Vitality Hack.notes: Developed by a Malkavian Tremere who hid in a hospital morgue. Uniform readings may cause suspicion in themselves.

Brotherhood of the Cup.name: Brotherhood of the Cup
Brotherhood of the Cup.description: Create a Vinculum-like bond between participants.
Brotherhood of the Cup.system: All participants contribute blood to a vessel. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 6). Success creates a Vinculum between all participants with rating equal to (successes ÷ 2, round up), maximum 5.
Brotherhood of the Cup.components: Ornate chalice, blood from all participants, powdered ruby

Sanguine Trail.name: Sanguine Trail
Sanguine Trail.description: Perceive the blood bond connections of a target.
Sanguine Trail.system: Requires a drop of target's blood. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 7). Success reveals all blood bonds the target has, with detail increasing with successes.
Sanguine Trail.components: Target's blood, silver mirror, black candle

_meta.description: Lasombra blood sorcery tradition drawing power from the Abyss
_meta.note: Learning Abyss Mysticism typically requires Obtenebration 3+ and a Lasombra teacher

Pierce the Murk.name: Pierce the Murk
Pierce the Murk.description: See clearly through any darkness, natural or supernatural.
Pierce the Murk.system: Spend 1 blood point. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 6). For the rest of the scene, see perfectly through all darkness, including that created by Obtenebration. Does not reveal Obfuscated individuals.
Pierce the Murk.components: Ink made from squid mixed with vitae

Whispers of the Abyss.name: Whispers of the Abyss
Whispers of the Abyss.description: Hear distant sounds through connected shadows.
Whispers of the Abyss.system: Concentrate on a shadow you can see. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 7). Success lets you hear sounds near any shadow connected to the one you're observing, as if standing there. Range limited to about 100 yards.
Whispers of the Abyss.components: Ear of a bat preserved in darkness

Shadow Feint.name: Shadow Feint
Shadow Feint.description: Create a shadow duplicate that moves independently for distraction.
Shadow Feint.system: Spend 1 blood point. Roll Wits + Occult (difficulty 6). Create a shadow copy of yourself that moves as you direct (reflexive action). Duplicate is obviously a shadow but can confuse opponents in combat (+1 difficulty to attack you) for one turn per success.

Eyes of the Abyss.name: Eyes of the Abyss
Eyes of the Abyss.description: Leave a shadow-eye that watches a location.
Eyes of the Abyss.system: Mark a location with your blood. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 6). A small shadow remains that transmits visual information to you. You can check what the eye sees with concentration. Lasts one night per success.

Shadow Walk.name: Shadow Walk
Shadow Walk.description: Step into one shadow and emerge from another.
Shadow Walk.system: Both shadows must be large enough to contain you and you must be able to see or have previously marked the destination shadow. Spend 2 blood points. Roll Wits + Occult (difficulty 7). Success transports you instantly. Failure means you emerge from a random shadow within range; botch traps you in the Abyss temporarily.
Shadow Walk.components: Must be standing in shadow, destination must be in shadow
Shadow Walk.range: Up to 1 mile per Obtenebration level

Summon Abyss Spirit.name: Summon Abyss Spirit
Summon Abyss Spirit.description: Call forth a minor spirit from the Abyss.
Summon Abyss Spirit.system: Requires hour-long ritual in complete darkness. Roll Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 8). Success summons a minor Abyss spirit that will perform one task before returning. Spirit has Strength, Dexterity, Stamina 2, can attack for 3 lethal damage, and has 4 health levels.
Summon Abyss Spirit.components: Blood sacrifice (3 points), darkness, spoken pact

Abyss Passage.name: Abyss Passage
Abyss Passage.description: Open a temporary doorway through the Abyss.
Abyss Passage.system: Spend 3 blood points and 1 Willpower. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 8). Creates a door-sized portal between two shadows you've personally visited. Others can pass through. Portal remains open for one minute per success. Those without Obtenebration who enter may be attacked by Abyss denizens.
Abyss Passage.components: Frame drawn in your blood, complete darkness at both ends

Binding the Abyss Spirit.name: Binding the Abyss Spirit
Binding the Abyss Spirit.description: Bind a summoned Abyss spirit to longer service.
Binding the Abyss Spirit.system: After successfully summoning a spirit, spend 1 permanent Willpower. Roll Manipulation + Occult vs. spirit's Willpower. Success binds the spirit for one month per success. Bound spirits can be called from any shadow with a simple action.
Binding the Abyss Spirit.components: Obsidian collar or chain, your blood

Enter the Abyss.name: Enter the Abyss
Enter the Abyss.system: Spend 5 blood points and 2 Willpower. Roll Stamina + Occult (difficulty 9). Success transports you bodily into the Abyss. Time and space work differently there. You can emerge from any shadow in the world, but finding your way requires Wits + Occult rolls. The Abyss is dangerous—entities there may attack.
Enter the Abyss.components: Complete darkness, ritual circle of your blood
Enter the Abyss.duration: Until you exit or are forced out

Abolish.name: Abolish
Abolish.description: Consign a target to the Abyss.
Abolish.system: Touch target and spend 4 blood points plus 2 Willpower. Roll Stamina + Occult vs. target's Stamina + Fortitude. Success sends target into the Abyss. Mortals are usually destroyed instantly. Supernaturals must find their way out (extended Wits + Occult, 20 successes, difficulty 9).
Abolish.components: Must be in shadow, target must be in shadow

_meta.description: Assamite blood sorcery tradition
_meta.note: Dur-An-Ki uses the same mechanical framework as Thaumaturgy but has different rituals and cultural context

From Marduk's Throat.name: From Marduk's Throat
From Marduk's Throat.description: Create an alchemical potion that permanently lowers the drinker's Generation by one, bypassing the Tremere Curse that prevented Assamite diablerie.
From Marduk's Throat.system: Requires one month of preparation and the blood of at least three Kindred of lower Generation than the intended recipient. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 9). Success creates one dose. The drinker's Generation permanently drops by one. Failure wastes all components; botch may have disastrous effects.
From Marduk's Throat.components: Blood of three lower-Generation Kindred (5 points each), rare herbs from the Alamut region, meteor iron vessel, month of ritual preparation
From Marduk's Throat.note: This ritual was developed to circumvent the Tremere Curse. Its existence is one of the Clan's most closely guarded secrets. Some Assamites consider its use dishonorable compared to true diablerie.
From Marduk's Throat.history: Developed by Assamite sorcerers after the Treaty of Tyre placed the Tremere Curse on the Clan, preventing them from committing diablerie. The ritual draws on pre-Islamic Mesopotamian magical traditions.

_meta.description: Necromancy Rituals from Lore of the Clans
_meta.source: V20 Lore of the Clans (Giovanni chapter)
_meta.note: These rituals supplement the core V20 Necromancy rituals

Ascension of the Blood.name: Ascension of the Blood
Ascension of the Blood.description: Purify blood to prevent or weaken blood bonds.
Ascension of the Blood.system: Requires 1 hour ritual with blood sample (yours or another's). Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 7). Success purifies the blood, preventing it from creating or strengthening blood bonds for one night per success. If used on blood already in someone's system, each success reduces effective blood bond strength by one level for one night.
Ascension of the Blood.components: Grave dirt, salt, the blood to be purified

Brotherhood of the Cup.name: Brotherhood of the Cup
Brotherhood of the Cup.description: Create a Vinculum-like bond between participants, similar to Sabbat Vaulderie.
Brotherhood of the Cup.system: All participants contribute blood to a vessel (at least 1 point each). Ritualist rolls Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 6). Success creates a Vinculum between all participants. Vinculum rating equals (successes ÷ 2, round up), maximum 5. Lasts until the next new moon unless reinforced.
Brotherhood of the Cup.components: Ornate chalice, blood from all participants, ashes of a cremated relative
Brotherhood of the Cup.note: Giovanni developed this to compete with Sabbat Vaulderie. Some consider its use distasteful.

Sanguine Trail.name: Sanguine Trail
Sanguine Trail.description: Perceive the blood bond connections of a target.
Sanguine Trail.system: Requires a drop of target's blood. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 7). Success reveals all blood bonds the target has (as regnant or thrall). 1 success: number of bonds. 3 successes: strength of each bond. 5 successes: identity of bonded individuals (if you know them) or clear mental image (if you don't).
Sanguine Trail.components: Target's blood, silver mirror, black candle

Death's Communion.name: Death's Communion
Death's Communion.description: Commune with death itself to enhance Necromantic power.
Death's Communion.system: Requires 3 hours in a place of death (cemetery, morgue, execution site). Roll Stamina + Occult (difficulty 8). For the remainder of the night, gain +2 dice to all Necromancy rolls. Each success beyond the first adds one additional night of duration.
Death's Communion.components: Bone dust from seven different corpses, your own blood (2 points)

The Ferryman's Recall.name: The Ferryman's Recall
The Ferryman's Recall.description: Embrace someone who died before they could receive the Embrace, creating a Mortuario.
The Ferryman's Recall.system: Must be performed within one lunar month of target's death. Requires the corpse. Roll Intelligence + Occult (difficulty 9). Success Embraces the target as normal, but they rise as a 'Mortuario' with ashen complexion similar to Harbingers of Skulls. The Mortuario gains +1 die to Necromancy but is haunted by fragments of their time in the Underworld.
The Ferryman's Recall.components: The corpse, two gold coins (for Charon's fee), water from the Styx (or suitable substitute), 5 blood points from the would-be sire
The Ferryman's Recall.note: Mortuarii may take the Mortuario Merit (3 pts) to represent this origin.

Manifest.name: Manifest
Manifest.description: A wraith ability allowing them to become temporarily solid in the material world.
Manifest.system: The ghost spends 2 Passion points to become solid and visible for one scene. While manifested, the wraith can interact with the physical world normally but can also be harmed by physical attacks. Aggravated damage forces the wraith back to the Shadowlands.
Manifest.note: This ability is typically only available to powerful wraiths or those with strong ties to the living.

_meta.description: V20 Disciplines - Powers levels 1-5
_meta.note: Higher-level powers (6+) exist but require elder vampires

Animalism.description: Supernatural command over animals and the Beast

1.name: Feral Whispers
1.system: Manipulation + Animal Ken, difficulty varies by animal
1.description: Communicate with animals empathically. Cannot command but can request and negotiate.

2.name: Beckoning
2.system: Charisma + Survival (difficulty 6)
2.description: Call all animals of a specific type within earshot. Successful animals are favorably disposed.

3.name: Quell the Beast
3.system: Manipulation + Intimidation/Empathy (difficulty 7) vs Willpower
3.description: Subdue the Beast within a mortal, making them passive and emotionless.

4.name: Subsume the Spirit
4.system: Manipulation + Animal Ken (difficulty 8)
4.description: Possess an animal's body, leaving your own in torpor-like state.

5.name: Drawing Out the Beast
5.system: Manipulation + Self-Control (difficulty 8)
5.description: Transfer your Beast to another creature, ending your frenzy but potentially causing theirs.

Auspex.description: Supernatural sensory acuity and psychic perception

1.name: Heightened Senses
1.system: Perception + relevant Ability; activates automatically or deliberately
1.description: Sharpen one or all senses to superhuman levels. Can also detect vampires.

2.name: Aura Perception
2.system: Perception + Empathy (difficulty 8)
2.description: Read auras to determine emotional state, nature, and supernatural status.

3.name: The Spirit's Touch
3.system: Perception + Empathy (difficulty varies by age)
3.description: Read psychic impressions from objects, sensing their history and owners.

4.name: Telepathy
4.system: Intelligence + Subterfuge (difficulty = target's Willpower)
4.description: Read surface thoughts or probe deeper into memories. Resisted by Willpower.

5.name: Psychic Projection
5.system: Perception + Occult (difficulty varies by distance)
5.description: Project consciousness out of body as invisible astral form.

1-5.name: Celerity
1-5.system: Each dot adds +1 die to Dexterity rolls, OR spend 1 blood to take extra action per dot
1-5.description: Move and act with supernatural speed. Can take multiple actions or add to Dexterity.

Chimerstry.description: Create illusions that affect all senses

1.name: Ignis Fatuus
1.system: Willpower (difficulty 6)
1.description: Create static illusion affecting one sense. Must concentrate to maintain.

2.name: Fata Morgana
2.system: Willpower (difficulty 6) + 1 blood
2.description: Create static illusion affecting all senses. More convincing than Ignis Fatuus.

3.name: Apparition
3.system: Intelligence + Subterfuge (difficulty 6)
3.description: Create moving illusion. Can animate previous illusions.

4.name: Permanency
4.system: Intelligence + Subterfuge (difficulty 6) + 1 Willpower
4.description: Make an illusion permanent until dispelled. No concentration needed.

5.name: Horrid Reality
5.system: Manipulation + Subterfuge (difficulty = target's Perception + Self-Control)
5.description: Create illusion so real it can cause actual damage to a single target.

1.name: Passion
1.system: Charisma + Empathy (difficulty = Humanity/Path)
1.description: Amplify or dampen a target's emotions.

2.name: The Haunting
2.system: Manipulation + Subterfuge (difficulty = target's Perception + Self-Control)
2.description: Implant subtle but disturbing hallucinations in target's mind.

3.name: Eyes of Chaos
3.system: Perception + Occult (difficulty varies)
3.description: See patterns in chaos, detect madness, understand hidden truths.

4.name: Voice of Madness
4.system: Manipulation + Empathy (difficulty 7) vs. Willpower
4.description: Cause mass frenzy or Rötschreck in vampires, or panic in mortals.

5.name: Total Insanity
5.system: Charisma + Subterfuge vs. Wits + Self-Control
5.description: Transfer all your derangements to target temporarily (or permanently with enough successes).

Dominate.description: Mental control through eye contact and verbal commands

1.name: Command
1.system: Manipulation + Intimidation (difficulty = target's Willpower)
1.description: Issue single one-word command that must be obeyed immediately.

2.name: Mesmerize
2.system: Manipulation + Leadership (difficulty = target's Willpower)
2.description: Implant false thought or hypnotic suggestion in target.

3.name: The Forgetful Mind
3.system: Wits + Subterfuge (difficulty = target's Willpower)
3.description: Rewrite target's memories. More successes = more believable alterations.

4.name: Conditioning
4.system: Charisma + Leadership (difficulty = target's Willpower) extended
4.description: Over time, make target increasingly susceptible to Dominate. Eventually, others struggle to affect them.

5.name: Possession
5.system: Charisma + Intimidation (difficulty 7) vs. Willpower
5.description: Take complete control of mortal body, leaving own body helpless.

1-5.name: Fortitude
1-5.system: Add Fortitude rating to soak pools for all damage types, including aggravated
1-5.description: Resist damage that would destroy lesser vampires. Each dot adds to soak.

Necromancy.description: Command of the dead and death energies
Necromancy.note: Path-based discipline. See thaumaturgy.json for ritual format.

Sepulchre Path.1: Insight - Sense ghosts and their strength
Sepulchre Path.2: Summon Soul - Call a ghost to you
Sepulchre Path.3: Compel Soul - Command ghost to answer questions
Sepulchre Path.5: Torment - Cause ghost pain, potentially destroying it

Bone Path.2: Apprentice's Brooms - Animate skeletons for simple tasks
Bone Path.4: Soul Stealing - Trap soul in object
Bone Path.5: Daemonic Possession - Allow ghost to possess corpse

Ash Path.2: Lifeless Tongues - Speak with recently dead
Ash Path.3: Dead Hand - Reach into Shadowlands physically
Ash Path.4: Ex Nihilo - Enter the Shadowlands bodily
Ash Path.5: Shroud Mastery - Manipulate barrier between worlds

1.name: Cloak of Shadows
1.system: No roll; must remain still and hidden
1.description: Remain unseen while motionless in shadow.

2.name: Unseen Presence
2.system: No roll; Wits + Stealth vs Perception + Alertness if noticed
2.description: Move about while invisible. Attacking breaks concealment.

3.name: Mask of a Thousand Faces
3.system: Manipulation + Performance (difficulty 7)
3.description: Assume appearance of another person.

4.name: Vanish from the Mind's Eye
4.system: Charisma + Stealth (difficulty = target's Wits + Alertness)
4.description: Disappear even while being observed.

5.name: Cloak the Gathering
5.system: As appropriate power, +1 difficulty per person concealed
5.description: Extend any Obfuscate power to conceal others.

1.name: Shadow Play
1.system: Wits + Occult (difficulty 7)
1.description: Control shadows, dimming lights and creating spooky effects.

2.name: Shroud of Night
2.system: Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 7) + 1 blood
2.description: Create zone of darkness that blocks light and dampens sound.

3.name: Arms of the Abyss
3.system: Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 7) + 1 blood
3.description: Summon shadow tentacles that can grapple and attack.

4.name: Black Metamorphosis
4.system: Manipulation + Courage (difficulty 7) + 2 blood
4.description: Transform into shadow-monster with tentacles and powers.

5.name: Tenebrous Form
5.system: Stamina + Occult (difficulty 6) + 3 blood
5.description: Become living shadow, immune to physical attacks.

1-5.name: Potence
1-5.system: Add Potence rating as automatic successes to Strength rolls
1-5.description: Feats of superhuman strength. Each dot = 1 automatic success.

1.name: Awe
1.system: Charisma + Performance (difficulty 7)
1.description: Draw positive attention and create favorable impression.

2.name: Dread Gaze
2.system: Charisma + Intimidation (difficulty = target's Wits + Courage)
2.description: Cause fear in a single target. May cause Rötschreck in vampires.

3.name: Entrancement
3.system: Appearance + Empathy (difficulty = target's Willpower)
3.description: Make target devoted to you for a scene (or longer with more successes).

4.name: Summon
4.system: Charisma + Subterfuge (difficulty 5)
4.description: Compel anyone you've met to come to you.

5.name: Majesty
5.system: Charisma + Intimidation (difficulty 7)
5.description: Project overwhelming aura. Must spend Willpower to even attempt hostility.

Protean.description: Shapeshifting and becoming one with nature

1.name: Eyes of the Beast
1.system: No roll required
1.description: See perfectly in darkness. Eyes glow red.

2.name: Feral Claws
2.system: No roll; causes Strength + 1 aggravated damage
2.description: Grow claws that do aggravated damage.

3.name: Earth Meld
3.system: No roll required
3.description: Sink into earth to sleep, immune to sunlight and fire.

4.name: Shape of the Beast
4.system: Stamina + Animal Ken (difficulty 7)
4.description: Transform into wolf or bat with special abilities.

5.name: Mist Form
5.system: No roll required; 1 blood
5.description: Become mist, immune to physical attacks.

1.name: Silence of Death
1.system: No roll; 1 blood
1.description: Create zone of total silence around you.

2.name: Scorpion's Touch
2.system: Willpower (difficulty 6) to convert blood
2.description: Convert blood to poison that causes Stamina damage per blood point.

3.name: Dagon's Call
3.system: Stamina + Athletics (difficulty = target's Stamina + Athletics)
3.description: Cause target's blood to hemorrhage if you've tasted it.

4.name: Baal's Caress
4.system: No roll; blood coats weapon
4.description: Coat weapon in blood that causes aggravated damage.

5.name: Taste of Death
5.system: Stamina + Athletics (difficulty 6), Dexterity + Athletics to hit
5.description: Spit blood like acid, causing aggravated damage.

1.name: The Eyes of the Serpent
1.system: Willpower (difficulty = target's Willpower)
1.description: Paralyze target with your gaze.

2.name: The Tongue of the Asp
2.system: No roll
2.description: Grow forked tongue that does aggravated damage and drains blood.

3.name: The Skin of the Adder
3.system: Stamina + Animal Ken (difficulty 6) + 1-3 blood
3.description: Transform skin to scales, gaining armor and flexibility.

4.name: The Form of the Cobra
4.system: Stamina + Animal Ken (difficulty 7)
4.description: Transform into large cobra.

5.name: The Heart of Darkness
5.system: No roll; 6+ blood
5.description: Remove heart for safekeeping, immune to staking.

Thaumaturgy.note: Path-based discipline. Primary path levels with Thaumaturgy rating; additional paths purchased separately.

Path of Blood.1: A Taste for Blood - Determine blood properties
Path of Blood.2: Blood Rage - Force vampire to spend blood
Path of Blood.3: Blood of Potency - Temporarily lower Generation
Path of Blood.4: Theft of Vitae - Steal blood at range
Path of Blood.5: Cauldron of Blood - Boil target's blood

Lure of Flames.2: Palm of Fire - Create hand-sized flame

1.name: Malleable Visage
1.system: Intelligence + Crafts (difficulty 6)
1.description: Alter your own face and body cosmetically.

2.name: Fleshcraft
2.system: Dexterity + Crafts (difficulty varies)
2.description: Sculpt flesh of yourself or others like clay.

3.name: Bonecraft
3.system: Strength + Crafts (difficulty varies)
3.description: Reshape and mold bone, create weapons or armor from skeleton.

4.name: Horrid Form
4.system: Stamina + Survival (difficulty 6) + 2 blood
4.description: Transform into 8-foot combat monster.

5.name: Bloodform
5.system: Stamina + Survival (difficulty 6) + all blood
5.description: Dissolve into sentient blood pool.

_meta.description: Combination Disciplines from Lore of the Clans
_meta.note: XP costs listed. Character must have all prerequisite Disciplines at listed levels.

Eyes of Alamut.description: Track anyone whose blood you've tasted, sensing their direction and approximate distance.
Eyes of Alamut.system: After tasting target's blood, spend 1 Willpower. Roll Perception + Survival (difficulty 6). Success reveals direction to target. More successes give distance estimate. Lasts one night.

Foul Blood.description: Your blood becomes poisonous to those who drink it.
Foul Blood.system: Spend 1 blood point to activate for the scene. Anyone drinking your blood takes 1 level of aggravated damage per blood point consumed. Does not affect blood bonds already established.

Grounding the Astral.description: Attack beings in astral/psychic projection forms.
Grounding the Astral.system: Can perceive and physically attack psychic projections and similar intangible forms. Roll normal attacks; damage is dealt to the projector's actual body.

Burning Wrath.system: While in frenzy, add +2 dice to all damage rolls. Frenzy must be genuine (not induced by Discipline).

Iron Glare.description: Hold target immobile with your gaze.
Iron Glare.system: Make eye contact and roll Charisma + Intimidation vs. target's Willpower. Success holds target immobile for 1 turn per success. Target can attempt to break free with Willpower roll (diff 8) each turn.

Reluctant Performance Artist.description: Create captive audience for a Mesmerized performer.
Reluctant Performance Artist.system: Add 1 Willpower to Mesmerize cost. Command target to perform publicly. Mortals with current Willpower less than your successes can only watch attentively (+1 if dangerous, +3 if performer attacks audience). Afterward, audience rationalizes or forgets.

Scourge of Alecto.description: Project your Beast's fury into another, causing damage and potential frenzy.
Scourge of Alecto.system: Spend 1 Willpower, concentrate for 1 turn on target. Roll permanent Willpower (diff = target's current Willpower). Each success inflicts 1 bashing damage. Frenzy-capable targets must roll to resist frenzy at +2 difficulty.

Typhonic Beast.description: Transform into a monstrous snake-beast hybrid.
Typhonic Beast.system: Combine serpent traits with beast form. Gain benefits of both Serpentis transformations and Protean beast form simultaneously.

Heart of the Serpent.system: After shedding skin via Serpentis, can channel Presence powers through the skin as if you were present. Skin lasts until destroyed.

Badger's Hide.system: While using Earth Meld, can spend blood to heal as if awake. Heal 1 bashing or 1 lethal per blood point spent.

Quicken the Natural Body.system: Touch an animal and spend 1 blood point. Animal gains your Celerity rating for the scene. Only works on natural animals.

Night Terror.description: Invade and control a sleeping target's dreams.
Night Terror.system: Target must be asleep. Roll Manipulation + Empathy (diff = target's Willpower). Enter and manipulate their dreams. Can deliver messages, cause nightmares (-1 die penalty next day), or implant suggestions.

Shadow Shield.system: In shadowy areas, add Obtenebration rating to soak pools against physical attacks. Does not protect against fire or sunlight.

Stygian Veil.description: Extend Obfuscate concealment through connected shadows.
Stygian Veil.system: While in shadow, your Obfuscate extends through all connected shadows. Observers in lit areas cannot see you even if looking at the shadow you occupy.

Creepy Clown Coat.description: Appear as the target's worst fear.
Creepy Clown Coat.system: Roll Wits + Awareness (diff = target's current Willpower). Appear as human representation of target's greatest fear. Target must roll Courage to do anything but react to you (matching your successes).

Days of Passions Past.description: Read target's historical emotional patterns from their aura.
Days of Passions Past.system: Roll Perception + Awareness (diff varies: 5 for last night, up to 9 for last decade). Each success reveals one frequently experienced emotion. Can detect past consumption of supernatural blood.

Do As I Say, Not As I Say.description: Target obeys the opposite of your commands.
Do As I Say, Not As I Say.system: Use Dominate's Command. Target interprets and obeys the opposite of what you say. 'Stop' means 'go,' 'be silent' means 'speak,' etc.

Babble.description: Create multi-person telepathic link where all must speak aloud.
Babble.system: Link up to permanent Willpower targets (or Willpower + Empathy if all have derangements). Linked individuals hear each other when speaking aloud, regardless of distance, as if standing next to each other.

Alley Cat's Lure.description: Project illusory small animal to scout or lure.
Alley Cat's Lure.system: Create illusory small animal (cat, rat, etc.) you can see through. Animal can travel up to 100 yards. Lasts one scene or until dismissed.

Feral Imbuing.system: Touch your animal ghoul and spend 2 blood points. Ghoul gains your Potence rating for the scene.

Pied Piper.system: Animals you've used Animalism on become supernaturally drawn to you. Counts as Herd rating equal to half your Animalism (round down) for feeding purposes from animal blood.

Carriage Horses.description: Transfer damage to your animal ghouls.
Carriage Horses.system: When wounded with animal ghouls in sight, spend 1 blood point and roll Stamina + Animal Ken (diff 8). Each success transfers 1 health level of damage (any type) to the animal. Reflexive action, immediately after being wounded.

Eventide Strength.system: Your Chimerstry illusions persist for up to one hour of sunlight exposure instead of instantly dispelling.

Heart's Desire.description: Create illusion revealing target's deepest desire.
Heart's Desire.system: Must have touched target within last hour. Spend 1 blood and 1 Willpower. Roll Intelligence + Subterfuge (diff = target's current Willpower), need 3 successes. Illusory item manifests representing target's greatest desire; you understand its meaning.

Sympathetic Agony.description: Attackers feel the pain they inflict on you.
Sympathetic Agony.system: Roll Manipulation + Intimidation (diff = target's Perception + Self-Control). For the scene, when target damages you, they suffer penalty to physical actions equal to your successes for 3 turns. Penalties don't stack.

Waking Dream.description: Briefly treat your illusion as real.
Waking Dream.system: Once per session, use a simple illusion (rope, trampoline, key) as if real for one turn. Cannot directly harm or help other characters.

Bliss.description: Draw on memories of beauty to resist the Beast, or project calm onto others.
Bliss.system: Enter trance viewing art. Within one scene after, roll Intelligence + Empathy (diff = 2x current Virtue rating). Success adds +1 temporary dot to Self-Control, Conscience, or Courage (max 5) for the night. Can use on others at +1 difficulty with Wits + Expression.

Devil's Mark.description: Imbue Presence powers into tattoos and body modifications.
Devil's Mark.system: Extended Dexterity + Expression (diff 7) requiring 2x Presence level in successes. Costs 1 blood + 1 per 'charge.' Modification grants access to imbued Presence power. Can spend permanent Willpower for permanent effect.

Doubletalk.description: Hide secret messages within normal speech.
Doubletalk.system: Speak normally while embedding hidden message only intended recipients can hear. Roll Wits + Expression (diff 6). Those without Auspex 2+ cannot detect the hidden layer.

Blood Sight.description: Analyze blood to determine type and potency.
Blood Sight.system: Touch blood sample. Roll Perception + Medicine (diff 6). 1 success: human/animal/supernatural. 2 successes: creature type. 5 successes: relative power (Generation, etc.) and possibly Clan. Also know if you touch the blood's owner for 1 hour per success.

Chain of Slavery.description: See if target is Dominated and identify the controller.
Chain of Slavery.system: Make eye contact. Roll Perception + Empathy (diff = controller's Willpower). Success reveals image of who Dominates target. 1 success: gender only. 3 successes: blurred but recognizable. 5 successes: clear image.

Theft of Will.description: Take control of nearby magical effects.
Theft of Will.system: Spend 1 Willpower. Roll Stamina + Occult (diff = original caster's Willpower). Success makes you the 'caster' of the effect. Only works on Thaumaturgy effects of level lower than your Thaumaturgy.

Thaumaturgical Sight.description: See magical auras on items and effects.
Thaumaturgical Sight.system: Stare at item/area and roll Perception + Occult (diff 8). 1 success: magic present. 3 successes: recognize ritual/path if you know it. 5 successes: recognize any Thaumaturgy effect. Requires separate action from Aura Perception.

Awaken the Stony Flesh.description: Animate corpse sculptures as if alive.
Awaken the Stony Flesh.system: Spend 1 blood point per corpse. Corpses you've fleshcrafted can be animated and controlled as if using Animalism. They follow simple commands.

False Aura.description: Paint a false aura onto a target.
False Aura.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Manipulation + Empathy (diff = target's Willpower). Choose what aura the target displays. Lasts 1 night per success. Can conceal vampire nature, emotional state, diablerie, etc.

The False Drink.description: Divert imbibed blood to avoid blood bond.
The False Drink.system: Upon drinking blood, roll Intelligence + Medicine (diff 8). Success stores blood in body cavity instead of absorbing it. Can vomit up later. Failure absorbs normally. Botch causes messy spray of blood.

Wound Sculpting.description: Accelerate healing by willing flesh to reform.
Wound Sculpting.system: Spend 1 blood point. Roll Wits + Medicine (diff 8). Each success heals 1 level of lethal or bashing damage. Each wound level requires 1 minute of concentration.

Command from Afar.description: Send telepathic commands to blood-bound servants.
Command from Afar.system: Spend 1 Willpower. Roll Charisma + Expression. Each success allows 5 words to one ghoul, blood-bound vampire, or Vinculum packmate, any distance, as long as it's night for both. Target knows who sent message but isn't compelled beyond normal bond.

Denial of Aphrodite's Kiss.system: Always active once learned. Presence levels 1-3 from higher-Generation vampires are ineffective against you, just as Dominate would be.

Divine Aura.description: Automatically Entrance anyone who reads your aura.
Divine Aura.system: Spend 1 blood point to activate for the night. Anyone using Aura Perception on you triggers reflexive Entrancement attempt. You need not know they're reading you.

Impeccable Manners.description: Unconsciously read auras to perfect social behavior.
Impeccable Manners.system: While interacting, roll Perception + Etiquette (diff 6 for mortals, 8 for supernaturals). Each success reduces difficulty of Etiquette and Persuasion rolls against that target by 1 for the scene. Does not affect Disciplines.

Rescue Beacon.description: Automatically Summon help if staked or torpored.
Rescue Beacon.system: Activates automatically if staked or in torpor. Spend 1 blood (exception to staked blood-spending rule). Roll Charisma + Subterfuge (diff 4). Summons nearest person who has tasted your blood (ghoul, bound vampire, etc.).

Retaliatory Terror.description: Attackers trigger your Dread Gaze reflexively.
Retaliatory Terror.system: When taking Brawl/Melee damage, may spend 1 blood for reflexive Charisma + Intimidation (diff = target's Wits + Courage, reduced by damage dealt, min 4). Success applies Dread Gaze effects. Cannot use if staked.

Telepathic Command.system: Must make eye contact. Can use Command silently via telepathy. Others nearby don't hear the order. Still cannot affect lower-Generation vampires.

Bagman's Shelter.description: Shadows reinforce makeshift shelters against sunlight.
Bagman's Shelter.system: Spend 1 blood and 1 Willpower before sleeping. Shadows darken to protect a small space from indirect sunlight. Only works while asleep. Doesn't protect against direct sun exposure.

Beneath Contempt.description: Project an aura of being too pathetic to harm.
Beneath Contempt.system: Spend 1 Willpower. For the scene, anyone viewing you as threat must roll Willpower (diff = your Humanity, or 4 if on Path). Failure means they dismiss you as unworthy of hostility. Doesn't make you invisible or forgotten.

Mover and Shaker.description: Build subtle community trust over time.
Mover and Shaker.system: Spend Willpower each night mingling with townspeople. Creates passive goodwill and trust. Social rolls against you by outsiders (including suspicious Kindred) are at +2 difficulty for weeks equal to Willpower spent.

_meta.description: Elder Discipline Powers (Level 6+) from Lore of the Clans
_meta.note: These powers require elder-level Disciplines and Storyteller approval

Eye of the Szlachta.description: See through the eyes of any creature you've fleshcrafted.
Eye of the Szlachta.system: Spend 1 blood point and concentrate for a turn. Roll Perception + Animal Ken (difficulty 6). Success lets you see and hear through any szlachta, vozhd, or other creature you've modified with Vicissitude. Can switch between creatures as an action.

Flesh Bond.description: Merge your consciousness with a fleshcrafted creation permanently.
Flesh Bond.system: Spend 5 blood points and 2 permanent Willpower. Your consciousness can inhabit any creature you've created with Vicissitude. If your body is destroyed, you survive in the creation. Can transfer between creations with Willpower roll.

Sibyl's Tongue.description: Speak prophecy in a trance state.
Sibyl's Tongue.system: Enter trance (1 Willpower). Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 8). Successes determine prophecy clarity: 1 = cryptic, 3 = symbolic but interpretable, 5 = clear vision. Storyteller provides the prophecy. Cannot be directed—the Madness Network chooses what you see.

Subtle Spy.description: Create an invisible, intangible illusion that reports back to you.
Subtle Spy.system: Spend 2 blood points. Create an invisible sensor that can move up to 1 mile away. Roll Wits + Stealth (difficulty 7) to avoid detection by those with Auspex. You see and hear everything the sensor perceives. Lasts one night.

Implanted Opinion.description: Plant a belief the target thinks is their own idea.
Implanted Opinion.system: Roll Manipulation + Subterfuge vs. target's Willpower. Success implants a belief or opinion the target considers genuinely their own. Cannot directly contradict core values. Lasts until successfully challenged or one month per success.

Memory Block.description: Completely seal away a memory, making it inaccessible even to supernatural probing.
Memory Block.system: Spend 1 Willpower. Roll Intelligence + Subterfuge (difficulty = target's Willpower). Success seals one memory or memory set. Even Auspex and other Dominate powers cannot access it without exceeding your successes.

Fealty.description: Create a permanent loyalty command that becomes part of the target's identity.
Fealty.system: Requires eye contact and spoken command. Spend 2 Willpower. Roll Charisma + Leadership (difficulty = target's Willpower). Success creates permanent loyalty to a person, organization, or ideal. Target genuinely believes in this loyalty. Removing requires exceeding original successes.

Curse the Laurel.description: Shrug off damage that would incapacitate lesser vampires, converting it to fatigue.
Curse the Laurel.system: Once per scene, after being reduced to Incapacitated or below, spend 3 blood points. Convert all damage beyond Wounded to fatigue instead. You remain at Wounded but are exhausted (-2 dice to all pools for the rest of the scene).

Confusion of the Eye.description: Create multiple illusory duplicates of yourself.
Confusion of the Eye.system: Spend 1 blood point per duplicate (max = Wits). Duplicates mirror your actions. Attackers must guess which is real or divide attacks. Roll Wits + Subterfuge vs. attacker's Perception + Alertness to fool them.

Mental Maze.description: Trap a target in an illusory mental labyrinth.
Mental Maze.system: Eye contact required. Spend 2 Willpower. Roll Intelligence + Intimidation vs. target's Wits + Investigation. Target believes they're lost in an endless maze. Escaping requires accumulating successes equal to yours on extended Wits + Investigation rolls (one per turn).

Scrawl.description: Leave Obfuscated messages only specific individuals can perceive.
Scrawl.system: Write or draw a message while spending 1 blood point. Designate who can perceive it (by name, type, or condition like 'Malkavians' or 'anyone who betrays me'). Message is completely invisible to all others. Lasts until you dismiss it or one year.

Shadow Perspective.description: See and hear through any shadow you can perceive.
Shadow Perspective.system: Spend 1 blood point. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 6). Success lets you shift your senses to any shadow within line of sight, then 'hop' to connected shadows. Can perceive through shadows up to 1 mile away with concentration.

Shadow Lair.description: Create a pocket dimension within the Abyss accessible through shadows.
Shadow Lair.system: Spend 5 blood points and 1 permanent Willpower to create. Lair exists within the Abyss, accessible through any shadow you create. Size equals 10 cubic yards per permanent Willpower. Only you and those you permit can enter. Persists indefinitely.

Shadow Watchtower.description: Perceive through all shadows in a vast area simultaneously.
Shadow Watchtower.system: Spend 3 blood points and 1 Willpower. Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 8). For the rest of the night, perceive through all shadows within miles equal to successes. Can focus on specific locations or scan broadly.

Relentless Pursuit.system: While in frenzy, spend 2 blood points. For the scene, you cannot be knocked down, grappled, or physically impeded. You may move through barriers by dealing your Potence rating in automatic damage to them. Does not protect against damage.

Temptation.description: Know and offer exactly what the target desires most.
Temptation.system: Spend 1 Willpower. Roll Perception + Empathy vs. target's Willpower. Success reveals target's deepest desire. You may then offer to fulfill it (genuinely or falsely). Target must spend Willpower equal to your successes to refuse your offer.

Star Magnetism.description: Become the absolute center of attention for everyone present.
Star Magnetism.system: Spend 2 blood points. Roll Charisma + Performance (difficulty 6). Everyone who can perceive you (up to 100 people per success) cannot look away or focus on anything else. Lasts for one scene or until you attack someone.

Phobia.description: Instill a permanent, crippling fear in the target.
Phobia.system: Eye contact required. Spend 2 Willpower. Roll Manipulation + Intimidation vs. target's Willpower. Success creates permanent phobia of something you specify. Target must flee or be incapacitated when confronting phobia trigger. Can only be removed by exceeding your successes.

The Decaying Orbit.description: Draw targets inexorably toward you over time.
The Decaying Orbit.system: Spend 3 Willpower. Roll Charisma + Leadership (difficulty = target's Willpower). Target feels compelled to move closer to you each night, traveling toward your location. Can affect up to Charisma targets simultaneously. Lasts until you dismiss it or target reaches you.

Ecstatic Agony.description: Rewire a target's nervous system so pain becomes pleasure.
Ecstatic Agony.system: Touch target and spend 2 blood points. Roll Dexterity + Medicine vs. target's Stamina + Fortitude. Success makes target experience all pain as intense pleasure. Wound penalties become bonuses to resist mental control. Lasts one night per success.

Kraken's Kiss.description: Transform into a massive tentacled horror.
Kraken's Kiss.system: Spend 4 blood points. Transform into a mass of tentacles, eyes, and mouths. Gain: 8 tentacle attacks per turn (Strength +2 damage each), 360-degree vision, ability to squeeze through any opening larger than your head. Lasts until dawn or you choose to revert.

quietus_variants._note: Assamite caste-specific variants of standard Quietus powers

Silence of Death.modification: Caster can still speak for purposes of incantations and rituals. All other sounds are silenced.

Scorpion's Curse.modification: Can be placed as a ward on objects or locations. Triggers when touched or entered by anyone other than the caster.

Dagon's Call.modification: Instead of (or in addition to) blood, can strip Willpower from the target at the same rate.

Baal's Caress.modification: Coated weapons can see and strike spirits and other immaterial beings as if they were solid.

Taste of Death.modification: Blood spit can affect spirits and ephemeral beings, dealing aggravated damage to them.

Silence of Death.modification: Vizier can choose who within the zone can hear. Selected individuals can communicate normally while others remain silenced.

Ishtar's Touch.description: Blood becomes a powerful narcotic when consumed by others.
Ishtar's Touch.system: Spend 1 blood point to activate for the scene. Anyone who drinks your blood (even a taste) must roll Willpower (difficulty 8) or become pliable and suggestible. -2 dice to resist Social rolls. Lasts one hour per blood point consumed.

_meta.description: Unique Bloodline Disciplines from Lore of the Bloodlines
_meta.note: These disciplines are unique to specific bloodlines and cannot be learned by others without special permission/circumstances.

Daimonion.description: The dark art of commanding demons and corrupting souls. Daimonion allows the Baali to sense evil, spread corruption, and eventually summon demonic entities.

1.name: Sense the Sin
1.description: The Baali can sense the moral weaknesses and secret shames of those around them.
1.system: Roll Perception + Empathy (difficulty equals target's Self-Control/Instinct + 4). Success reveals the target's greatest moral weakness, secret shame, or vice. The Baali gains +2 dice on social rolls to tempt or manipulate the target using this information.

2.name: Fear of the Void Below
2.description: The Baali projects an aura of supernatural terror, forcing victims to confront their deepest fears.
2.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Manipulation + Empathy (difficulty equals target's Courage + 4). Success causes the target to flee in terror for one turn per success. If the target cannot flee, they cower helplessly.

3.name: Flames of the Netherworld
3.description: The Baali conjures hellfire that burns the soul as well as the flesh.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Willpower (difficulty 7). Success allows the Baali to conjure flames that deal aggravated damage. The flames deal the Baali's Willpower in dice of damage and can be thrown up to 10 yards per Willpower dot.

4.name: Psychomachia
4.description: The Baali possesses a mortal, riding their body while their soul is suppressed.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points and roll Manipulation + Intimidation (difficulty equals target's Willpower). Success allows possession for one scene per success. The Baali's body falls into torpor-like state during possession. Vampires and other supernatural beings may resist with Willpower.

5.name: Conduit
5.description: The Baali becomes a gateway for demonic entities, channeling their power into the world.
5.system: Spend 3 blood points and 1 Willpower. Roll Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 8). Success summons a minor demonic entity that serves the Baali for one night. The demon's power depends on successes achieved. Botches may result in hostile entities or possession.

6.name: Call the Great Beast
6.description: Summon more powerful demons with greater autonomy.
6.system: As Conduit, but more powerful entities can be summoned. Requires lengthy ritual.

7.name: The Re-Embrace
7.description: Transform another vampire into a Baali through demonic ritual.
7.system: Extended ritual requiring target's complete blood supply, demonic pact, and 1 permanent Willpower. Target becomes Baali with new Clan weakness and Daimonion as in-Clan Discipline.

Melpominee.description: The Discipline of the supernatural voice. Melpominee allows the Daughters to project emotions, madness, and even physical harm through song.

1.name: The Missing Voice
1.description: Project your voice to a distant location within line of sight, or speak without moving your lips.
1.system: No roll required for simple ventriloquism. For greater distances, roll Wits + Performance (difficulty 6). Success projects voice up to 100 yards per success.

2.name: Phantom Speaker
2.description: Implant a message in a location that plays when specific conditions are met.
2.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Manipulation + Performance (difficulty 7). Success implants a message up to one sentence per success, triggered by conditions you specify. Lasts one night per success.

3.name: Madrigal
3.description: Your song affects the emotions of all who hear it.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Charisma + Performance (difficulty 7). Success affects all who hear (up to 20 yards per Charisma). You can increase or decrease one emotion significantly. Lasts one scene.

4.name: Siren's Call
4.description: Your voice compels a single target to approach you.
4.system: Roll Charisma + Performance vs. target's Willpower. Success forces target to approach you, ignoring obstacles and danger. Target may attempt Willpower roll (difficulty 8) each turn to resist.

5.name: Virtuosa
5.description: Your voice can cause physical damage to a single target.
5.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Manipulation + Performance (difficulty 6). Each success inflicts 1 level of lethal damage. The target hears a terrible, painful note that resonates in their body.

6_mosh_pit.name: Mosh Pit
6_mosh_pit.description: Inspire frenzy in supernatural creatures prone to such states.
6_mosh_pit.system: Spend 1 blood point, roll Manipulation + Performance (choose difficulty). Target must roll to resist frenzy at same difficulty. Daughter has no control over the resulting frenzy.

6_primal_scream.name: Primal Scream
6_primal_scream.description: Inspire Rötschreck (terror frenzy) rather than rage frenzy.
6_primal_scream.system: As Mosh Pit, but causes Rötschreck instead of standard frenzy.

7.name: Haunting Melody
7.description: Leave a madness-inducing tune hanging in an area.
7.system: Choose a Derangement and roll Manipulation + Performance (choose difficulty). Song remains for 1 day per success. Anyone entering must make Willpower roll at your difficulty or suffer the chosen Derangement for the night. Botch makes it permanent.

8.name: Calling Song
8.description: Implant a tune in multiple targets that compels them to seek out a location.
8.system: Sing to each target individually, roll Charisma + Performance (difficulty = current Willpower). Later, sing at chosen location to activate. Targets come as if under Summon (Presence 4). Supernatural creatures may resist with Willpower (difficulty 8) - need 3 consecutive successes to break free.

Flight.description: The ability to fly, gifted to Gargoyles by their creator Virstania. This power is instinctive to all Gargoyles.

1.name: Glide
1.description: Slow descent and short gliding hops.
1.system: Can fall any distance without taking damage. Can glide horizontally up to 50 feet per 10 feet of height.

2.name: Hover
2.description: Remain stationary in the air.
2.system: Spend 1 blood point to hover in place for up to one scene. Can maintain altitude without forward movement.

3.name: Fly
3.description: True powered flight.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point to fly for the scene at speeds up to 30 mph. Combat maneuvers while flying require Dexterity + Athletics rolls.

4.name: Swoop
4.description: High-speed diving attacks.
4.system: Spend 1 blood point. Diving attack adds +2 dice to damage. If used with Potence, add Potence rating to damage as well.

5.name: Aerial Combat
5.description: Complete mastery of flight in combat.
5.system: No blood cost for basic flight. All aerial maneuvers at -2 difficulty. Can carry up to twice normal load while flying.

Visceratika.description: The stone-like Discipline that makes Gargoyles so durable. Allows transformation of skin to stone and related powers.

1.name: Skin of the Chameleon
1.description: Blend with stone surroundings like a chameleon.
1.system: Spend 1 blood point. +2 dice to Stealth rolls when near stone. When perfectly still, +3 dice instead.

2.name: Scry the Hearthstone
2.description: See through stone you touch.
2.system: Spend 1 blood point and touch a stone surface. Roll Perception + Alertness (difficulty 7). Can see through up to 10 feet of stone per success.

3.name: Bond with the Mountain
3.description: Merge partially with stone for protection.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point to gain +2 dice to soak pools while touching stone. Lasts one scene.

4.name: Armor of Terra
4.description: Transform skin to living stone.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points. Skin becomes stone-like, gaining 4 additional soak dice against all damage (including aggravated). Lasts one scene. -1 to Dexterity rolls.

5.name: Flow Within the Mountain
5.description: Merge completely with stone.
5.system: Spend 3 blood points to merge with stone surface. Can remain indefinitely, emerging at will. While merged, aware of surroundings via tremorsense out to 50 feet.

Mytherceria.description: The fae-touched Discipline of the Kiasyd, dealing with dreams, riddles, and the strange logic of the fae.

1.name: Fae Sight
1.description: See through fae glamour and perceive the dreaming world.
1.system: Spend 1 blood point to activate for the scene. Can see through Chimerstry, fae illusions, and perceive chimera and other fae phenomena.

2.name: Darkling Trickery
2.description: Speak in riddles that confuse and disorient the listener.
2.system: Roll Manipulation + Occult vs. target's Intelligence + Occult. Success leaves target confused, suffering +2 difficulty to all actions for turns equal to successes.

3.name: Goblin's Oath
3.description: Create a binding oath that punishes the oathbreaker.
3.system: Both parties must willingly enter the oath. If either breaks it, they suffer 1 unsoakable level of aggravated damage per night until they make amends.

4.name: Riddle Phantastique
4.description: Trap a victim's mind in an unsolvable riddle.
4.system: Spend 1 Willpower and roll Intelligence + Occult vs. target's Intelligence + Occult. Success traps target in contemplation of the riddle, unable to take actions. Target may attempt Intelligence + Occult roll (difficulty 9) each turn to break free.

5.name: Absorb the Mind
5.description: Drain knowledge directly from a target's mind.
5.system: Spend 2 blood points and roll Intelligence + Empathy vs. target's Willpower. Success allows access to target's memories and knowledge. Can gain temporary dots in target's Abilities (1 dot per success) for one night.

Obeah.description: The healing Discipline of the Salubri, allowing them to mend wounds, soothe minds, and guide others toward Golconda.

1.name: Sense Vitality
1.description: Perceive the health and emotional state of others.
1.system: Roll Perception + Empathy (difficulty 7). Success reveals target's current health levels, blood pool (for vampires), and emotional state.

2.name: Anesthetic Touch
2.description: Numb pain with a touch.
2.system: Touch target and roll Willpower (difficulty 6). Success removes all wound penalties for one scene. Does not heal damage, only removes pain.

3.name: Corpore Sano
3.description: Heal wounds with a touch.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point per health level healed. Roll Intelligence + Medicine (difficulty 8 for lethal, 9 for aggravated). Each success heals 1 level. Aggravated damage requires 2 blood points per level.

4.name: Mens Sana
4.description: Heal mental damage and remove derangements.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points and 1 Willpower. Roll Intelligence + Empathy vs. difficulty based on derangement severity. Success removes temporary derangements. Permanent derangements require extended therapy.

5.name: Unburdening the Bestial Soul
5.description: Help another vampire resist the Beast and approach Golconda.
5.system: Extended process requiring multiple sessions. Spend 3 blood points per session. Guided vampire gains cumulative bonus to Humanity rolls. May eventually achieve Golconda with sufficient progress.

Valeren.description: The warrior Discipline of the Salubri, focused on combat and protection. Replaced Obeah in the antitribu.

1.name: Sense Vitality
1.description: As Obeah 1 - perceive health and emotional state.
1.system: Roll Perception + Empathy (difficulty 7). Success reveals target's current health levels, blood pool (for vampires), and emotional state.

2.name: Burning Touch
2.description: Cause pain with a touch.
2.system: Touch target and roll Willpower (difficulty 6). Success inflicts wracking pain - target loses next action and suffers +2 difficulty to all rolls for the turn.

3.name: Armor of Caine's Fury
3.description: Supernatural protection in battle.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point to gain +2 soak dice against all attacks for the scene.

4.name: Blades of the Righteous
4.description: Create weapons of spiritual fire.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points to manifest glowing weapons from your hands. Weapons deal Strength +2 aggravated damage. Last one scene.

5.name: Vengeance of Samiel
5.description: Channel righteous fury into devastating attacks.
5.system: Spend 2 blood points and 1 Willpower. For the scene, all attacks deal +3 dice of damage. Third eye blazes with light visible to all.

Thanatosis.description: The Discipline of death and decay, allowing the Samedi to control their rotting bodies and spread decay to others.

1.name: Hag's Wrinkles
1.description: Alter facial features through controlled decay and regrowth.
1.system: Roll Stamina + Disguise (difficulty 7). Success allows minor alterations to facial features. Combined with Obfuscate, can create convincing disguises.

2.name: Putrefaction
2.description: Accelerate decay in living or dead flesh.
2.system: Touch target and roll Dexterity + Medicine (difficulty 8). Success causes 1 level of lethal damage per success as flesh rots. On corpses, can reduce body to bones in minutes.

3.name: Ashes to Ashes
3.description: Transform into a pile of animated ash.
3.system: Spend 2 blood points to transform into ash. Can move slowly (walking speed), seep through cracks, and reform at will. In this form, only fire and sunlight cause damage.

4.name: Withering
4.description: Cause a limb to wither and become useless.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points and touch target's limb. Roll Manipulation + Medicine vs. target's Stamina + Fortitude. Success withers the limb, making it useless. Effect lasts one night for mortals, one scene for vampires.

5.name: Infection
5.description: Spread supernatural disease through touch.
5.system: Spend 2 blood points and touch target. Roll Stamina + Medicine (difficulty 8). Target contracts a wasting disease dealing 1 level of lethal damage per night. Disease lasts nights equal to successes. Mortals may die; vampires waste but cannot die from this alone.

6.name: Marrow Sucker
6.system: For every 20 pounds of bone consumed, gain 1 blood point. Bones turn to grey pulp. Only those with Thanatosis 6 can benefit from this.

Temporis.description: The Discipline of time manipulation, unique to the True Brujah. Allows slowing, speeding, and eventually controlling the flow of time.

1.name: Time Sense
1.description: Perfect awareness of time's passage.
1.system: Always know exact time, can sense temporal disturbances. Roll Perception + Alertness (difficulty 6) to detect use of Celerity or other time-affecting powers nearby.

2.name: Recurring Contemplation
2.description: Trap a target in a loop of contemplation.
2.system: Roll Manipulation + Empathy vs. target's Willpower. Success traps target in a moment of contemplation, unable to act for 1 turn per success.

3.name: Leaden Moment
3.description: Slow time around a target.
3.system: Spend 1 blood point and roll Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 7). Success slows target - they act last each turn and lose 2 dice from all pools. Lasts 1 turn per success.

4.name: Patience of the Norns
4.description: Speed time around yourself.
4.system: Spend 2 blood points. Gain extra actions equal to successes on Wits + Alertness roll (difficulty 7). Unlike Celerity, these are full actions at no penalty. Lasts one turn.

5.name: Clotho's Gift
5.description: Stop time for a single target.
5.system: Spend 2 blood points and 1 Willpower. Roll Manipulation + Occult vs. target's Stamina + Fortitude. Success freezes target in time for 1 turn per success. Frozen target cannot be harmed but also cannot act.

6.name: Insight
6.description: Step forward in time briefly to see results of actions.
6.system: Spend 1 Willpower, roll Wits + Alertness (difficulty 8). Each success grants +1 die to next action as you glimpse its outcome.

8_temporal_understanding.name: Temporal Understanding
8_temporal_understanding.description: Extended glimpse into future provides Willpower.
8_temporal_understanding.system: Spend 1 Willpower, roll Wits + Alertness (difficulty 8). Each success grants 1 temporary Willpower point usable this scene.

8_rewind.name: Rewind
8_rewind.description: View the past in current location.
8_rewind.system: Spend 1 blood point, roll Stamina + Occult (difficulty 9). Can view events that occurred in current area up to: 1 success = 1 week, 2 = 1 month, 3 = 1 year, 4 = 1 century, 5 = 1 millennium. Takes 1 hour per 10 years viewed.

_meta.description: Combination Disciplines from Lore of the Bloodlines
_meta.note: XP costs listed. Character must have all prerequisite Disciplines at listed levels.

Command the Swarm.description: Command vermin and pestilent creatures as extensions of your will.
Command the Swarm.system: Spend 1 blood point to summon and command a swarm of insects, rats, or similar vermin within 100 yards. The swarm obeys simple commands and can attack (difficulty 6 to avoid, 1 level of lethal damage per turn in the swarm). Lasts one scene.

Celebrity.description: Project an aura of celebrity glamour, making others believe you're famous.
Celebrity.system: Roll Appearance + Presence (difficulty 8). Each success adds 1 die to social interactions where fame is advantageous (getting into clubs, inspiring attention, etc.). Functions like temporary Fame background. Lasts one scene.

Silent Voice.description: Project your voice silently into a target's mind.
Silent Voice.system: Roll Manipulation + Performance (difficulty 6). Success allows you to speak directly into target's mind. Target hears your voice as if you spoke aloud but no one else can hear. Lasts one scene.

Tune Out.system: Spend 1 Willpower. For one scene, the constant music of the Fugue is silenced. Removes any penalties from the Fugue's distraction. Cannot use Melpominee while Fugue is silenced.

The Shoulders of Atlas.description: Carry much heavier loads while flying.
The Shoulders of Atlas.system: While flying, can carry additional weight equal to Potence x 200 lbs beyond normal carrying capacity. Lasts as long as Flight is active.

Falconer's Dive.description: Devastating diving attack with stone-hardened body.
Falconer's Dive.system: When diving from height of at least 30 feet, activate Armor of Terra as part of the attack. Add +4 dice to damage. Both Gargoyle and target take 2 levels of bashing damage from impact (soakable).

Carry the Mountain's Burden.system: Spend 2 blood points. For one scene, cannot be moved against your will by any physical force. Weight increases to 10x normal. Cannot fly or move quickly while active.

I Am the Keystone.system: Spend 2 blood points and touch a structure. For one scene, you can hold up structural loads that would normally require support columns. Can prevent building collapse, hold up bridges, etc. Cannot move while doing this.

Bloodied Hands.description: Sense death and violence in a location's past.
Bloodied Hands.system: Roll Perception + Occult (difficulty 7). Success reveals deaths that occurred nearby - more successes reveal more detail about how victims died and who killed them. Range is 100 feet per Necromancy dot.

Leer of Hades.description: Your death-mask gaze terrifies those who see it.
Leer of Hades.system: Roll Manipulation + Intimidation vs. target's Courage + 4. Success causes target to flee in terror. If they cannot flee, they cower and cannot act for 1 turn per success.

Sutekh Fathers Anubis.description: Take on an aspect of a death god.
Sutekh Fathers Anubis.system: Spend 3 blood points and 1 Willpower. For one scene, take on jackal-headed or otherwise death-godlike appearance. Gain +2 to all Intimidation rolls, +2 to all Necromancy rolls, and can perceive the Shadowlands as if standing in it.

Dreamstalker.description: Implant dreams in sleeping victims that affect their waking behavior.
Dreamstalker.system: Whisper to sleeping target. Roll Manipulation + Expression (difficulty = target's current temporary Willpower). Success implants dream elements that affect concentration (+2 difficulty to extended actions) and emotional response to dream subjects. Duration: 1 success = 1 turn, 2 = 1 hour, 3 = 1 night, 4 = 1 week, 5+ = 1 month.

Sacrifice to Nightmare.description: Summon an Abyss nightmare to consume sacrifices.
Sacrifice to Nightmare.system: Must inscribe Chanjelin Ward in a room. Spend 2 blood points to summon a tentacled nightmare creature. Creature has 4 tentacles (deal Strength +1 lethal via constriction, resisted with opposed Strength diff 6) and a maw (Strength +2 aggravated after successful grapple). Nightmare shares your health levels and soaks. Cannot exist outside the warded room for more than 1 minute.

Soul Separation.description: Temporarily separate your soul from your body.
Soul Separation.system: Spend 2 Willpower. Your soul leaves your body as a ghostly form visible only to those with Auspex 2+ or in the Shadowlands. Can move through walls, observe, and use Auspex. Body falls into torpor-like state. Lasts one scene or until you choose to return. If body is destroyed, soul remains as a ghost.

Unseen Spirit.description: Become invisible to ghosts and spirits.
Unseen Spirit.system: Spend 1 blood point. For one scene, you are invisible to ghosts, spirits, and beings in the Shadowlands. They cannot perceive you unless you take hostile action against them.

Vital Fluids.description: Heal damage by transferring blood directly into wounds.
Vital Fluids.system: Touch a wounded target. Spend blood points equal to health levels to heal, which flow directly from your veins into their wounds. Heals lethal damage instantly (usually requires time). Cannot heal aggravated damage this way.

Auguring the Sickness.description: Diagnose diseases and ailments with supernatural accuracy.
Auguring the Sickness.system: Roll Perception + Medicine (difficulty 6). Success reveals all diseases, poisons, and supernatural ailments affecting the target, as well as their severity and likely progression.
Auguring the Sickness.notes: This is actually an Obeah/Valeren power, not a combination, but often listed with them

Ending the Watch.description: Grant peaceful final death to suffering vampires.
Ending the Watch.system: The target vampire must be willing. Spend 1 Willpower and touch the target. They die peacefully without the usual horror of Final Death. This is considered a merciful act.
Ending the Watch.notes: This is actually an Obeah power

Switched at Death.description: Make yourself look like a specific corpse.
Switched at Death.system: Must view target corpse. Roll Stamina + Disguise (difficulty 7). Success allows you to assume the appearance of that corpse as it looked at death. Useful for faking deaths or replacing specific corpses. Lasts one scene.

Grisly Gris-Gris.description: Create protective charms from your own decaying flesh.
Grisly Gris-Gris.system: Spend 1 blood point and take 1 level of lethal damage to create a charm from your flesh. Charm grants +1 die to soak rolls when worn. Can create up to 3 active charms. Each lasts one month.

Exquisite Corpse.description: Appear as a beautiful version of yourself instead of rotting.
Exquisite Corpse.system: Spend 1 blood point and 1 Willpower. For one scene, you appear as an idealized, non-rotting version of yourself. Appearance increases to 3 (or higher if you had higher Appearance in life). Others may see through with Auspex (contested roll vs. your Manipulation + Subterfuge).

Old Friend.description: Make a target believe you're an old, trusted friend by imprinting alternate timeline memories.
Old Friend.system: Make physical contact and describe a shared memory. Roll Manipulation + Empathy (difficulty = target's current Willpower). Duration: 1 success = 1 scene, 2 = 1 night, 3 = 1 week, 4 = 1 month, 5 = 1 year. Target believes you loyal and trustworthy. Memories are real (from alternate timeline), making this very difficult to detect. After power fades, target still considers you a friend until given reason not to. Refreshing on affected target is +1 difficulty.

Jackhammer Punch.description: Repeat the same strike multiple times in the same instant.
Jackhammer Punch.system: When making an unarmed attack, spend 1 blood point. Add your Temporis rating as additional Potence dots for calculating damage only.

_meta.description: V20 Necromancy Paths beyond the core book

Nightshade Path.name: The Nightshade Path
Nightshade Path.description: A Bahari-specific Necromancy path focusing on the boundaries between life and death, plant matter, and birthing ghosts. Developed by the Cult of Lilith within the Tal'Mahe'Ra.
Nightshade Path.source: V20 The Black Hand: A Guide to the Tal'Mahe'Ra

1.name: Bury the Bones
1.description: The necromancer can accelerate or arrest decomposition of corpses, turning a dead mortal into a bloated host for flies in seconds or preserving a body indefinitely.
1.system: Spend 1 blood point (drip blood on corpse), roll Wits + Occult (diff 6). Successes determine time affected: 1=day, 2=week, 3=month, 4=year, 5+=ST discretion. Works on Kindred within 1 turn of Final Death. Living organisms on the corpse (plants, fungi, insects up to scarab size) are affected as well.

2.name: Witch's Fruit
2.description: By exposing edible plant matter to her blood, the necromancer awakens trace necrotic energies so anyone consuming it can sense and touch the Shadowlands.
2.system: Spend 1 blood point while touching edible plant matter (no roll). First living creature to eat it falls into waking, ambulatory trance for one scene—can see into Shadowlands, hear ghosts, touch and be touched by them. Cannot contact non-living Shadowlands objects. +2 difficulty to all actions except Willpower (waived for those familiar with supernatural). Tainted matter rots by next sunrise.

3.name: Raise the Green One
3.description: Channel legends of al-Khidr, Osiris, and the Green Man to raise a corpse bound and strengthened by plant matter—leaves cover its skin, strong vines supplement rotted sinews.
3.system: Roll Wits + Occult (diff 8), spend 1 Willpower and 1 blood point. Corpse must lay on/in fertile soil. Only one Green One active at a time. Stats: Str 4, Dex 4, Sta 4, Athletics 2, Brawl 3, effective Fortitude 2. Bashing damage halved; suffer bashing from gunfire like vampires. Acts in standard initiative (unlike normal zombies).

4.name: Wails and Whispers
4.description: The necromancer screams like a banshee to lure souls to death (increasing injury severity) or whispers to fix souls in life (delaying death).
4.system: Concentrate on target (need not hear you), spend 1 Willpower, roll Wits + Occult (diff 8). SCREAM: Each success adds 1 level lethal damage to next injury target suffers that scene. WHISPER: Each success sets aside 1 level of damage from next injury until scene ends, then damage returns. Can delay death until scene's end, but massive destruction may still kill.

5.name: Chthonic Womb
5.description: Combine murder and fertility to birth the ghost of a slain mortal. Drink the victim's blood to grab hold of his soul, then trap it within you to later summon as a bound ghost.
5.system: Drink at least 1 blood point from mortal, make physical contact at moment of death, spend 1 Willpower, roll Wits + Occult (diff 8). Soul stored dormant for 1 month per success. Multiple souls drain 1 extra blood per night per soul beyond the first. Summon ghost with recently deceased stats or life stats, must perform 3 services then is freed. Traumatic commands may make ghost treat necromancer as a fetter (haunt until banished).

Corpse in the Monster.name: The Corpse in the Monster
