notable-groups.The Maenads: Feminist Old Skoolers worshipping Malkavian Antediluvian
notable-groups.Mary's Kids: Punk Sorcerers claiming to have bound Bloody Mary

_meta.description: Anti-infernalist organizations

sabbat-inquisition.iron-reliquary: Badge of office, Sabbat symbol in iron, some grant True Faith

josians.origin: Named for King Josiah who ended Moloch worship
josians.purpose: Hunt Gehenna cults and infernalists in Camarilla

_meta.description: New combination Disciplines from Rites of the Blood

Animus Ligature.effect: Detect deep attachments in aura as scarlet flares. Shows blood bonds, Vinculi, oaths. Cannot distinguish infernal from other oaths.

False Death.effect: Target appears to die (leaves remains) but is displaced to timeless pocket realm. Returns when predetermined circumstances occur. Wipes knowledge-locks (Summon, Scry, etc. register as dead).

Retain the Quick Blood.description: Blood-conserving technique from the Anarch Revolt era when Assamites allied with antitribu. Blood spent on Celerity returns to blood pool at rate of one blood point per hour. Returned blood never exceeds maximum blood pool - excess is lost.
Retain the Quick Blood.history: Adapted to Protean in modern nights as it spread among Anarchs

Slenderman.description: When aware of being photographed, cause occult energy burst to obscure appearance. Image shows only nondescript humanoid figure without distinct characteristics. Reflexive - no action required. Works on video/webcam recordings but must pay blood cost each turn recorded. Cannot alter existing photographs.

Smiling Jack's Trick.description: Attributed to the legendary Anarch. Makes subject confuse you for another Kindred in immediate vicinity. Per the story, Jack made a Scourge believe his lieutenant was actually Jack, allowing escape.
Smiling Jack's Trick.system: Contested roll: Manipulation + Performance (diff = subject's Intelligence + 5, max 10) vs. subject's Wits + Subterfuge (diff 7). Success means subject transposes you with another Kindred in line of sight. Duration: 1 hour minus (10 × subject's Intelligence) minutes. Only works on equal or lower generation.

Stonesight.description: See through stone surface as if glass (3ft × 3ft area, up to 3ft depth). Stone doesn't actually become transparent - others on far side cannot see you. Lasts one scene.

Suck It Up.description: Touch spilled blood to absorb it directly into blood pool (up to maximum). 'Strips the ground clean' unless you choose to leave some. Useful after Anarch conflicts when lapping blood from the ground would draw attention. Bodies left bloodless still attract attention regardless.

Tenebrous Veil.description: Created centuries ago by Lasombra and Malkavian Anarchs. Bend shadow around body to remain effectively unseen while motionless. Requires at least one square foot of shadow present. No roll needed - simply works as long as you remain still.

Encoded Missive.description: Store a Discipline power in digital format for proxy use. Create 'buffer' over a scene by paying power's normal cost plus blood points equal to level squared. Send via email/text. Proxy must be Kindred with file on local device. Proxy uses own Traits for rolls. File works once then deletes. Can only buffer: Auspex, Chimerstry, Dementation, Dominate, Obfuscate, Presence.
Encoded Missive.controversy: Some Anarchs fear it's a Tremere Trojan horse for remote Domination. Others wonder why it can't buffer Thaumaturgy itself.

Fangster.description: Hides digital information from those who shouldn't access it by causing people to overlook it.
Fangster.note: Works as described - no dice roll typically needed

Bloodspot.description: Hides digital information by causing people to misunderstand the protected content.
Bloodspot.note: Works as described - no dice roll typically needed

Demonology.description: Knowledge of demonic secrets and summoning. Covers practical application where Occult/Theology cover theory.
Demonology.availability: Restricted by Church and Inquisition. Demons spread censored versions.

Mark of Caine.requirement: Pre-First Sabbat Civil War, participated in lost Mark of Caine ritus, on spiritual Path
Mark of Caine.effect: Twisted True Faith (1 dot) using Caine symbols. +2 dice resist mortal True Faith.
Mark of Caine.loss: Revert to Humanity or wassail = lost forever

armory.name: Armory
armory.description: A collection of weapons, ammunition, and armor for hunting vampires.

levels.1: Enough legal weaponry to outfit yourself and maybe one other person (handgun, knife, basic protective gear).
levels.2: Enough legal weaponry to outfit a street gang of 10 people.
levels.3: Small militia level. Can outfit 5 individuals with gray-area weaponry most civilians couldn't obtain.
levels.4: SWAT team appropriate, including military-grade hardware. Enough for a 10-man team. Legal scrutiny risk.
levels.5: Paramilitary envy. Tools to clean/repair almost any weapon. Significant illegal weapons, enough for a platoon. Discovery means prison or armed standoff.

base_of_operations.name: Base of Operations
base_of_operations.description: A secure headquarters for rest, training, and planning attacks. Points divided among three categories.

luxury.description: Quality of appointments (corresponds to Resources level)

levels.3: Relative comfort with host of amenities.
levels.4: Luxurious, unique in design and appearance.

levels.1: Small apartment or underground chamber; 1-2 rooms.
levels.2: Large apartment or small family home; 3-4 rooms.
levels.3: Warehouse, church, or large home; 5-8 rooms.
levels.5: Sprawling estate or vast tunnel network; 20+ rooms.

security.description: Difficulty to penetrate (adds to intrusion difficulty or required successes)

levels.2: Deadbolts, window bars, guard dog. Secure from ordinary threats.
levels.3: Modern locks, bars, alarm system, security cameras.
levels.4: Reinforced walls, sectionalized access, panic rooms. Prison-level.
levels.5: All previous plus unique features: remote location, geographical barriers, possible occult protections.

guide.name: Guide
guide.description: A mysterious spiritual entity that aids the hunter through dreams, signs, and portents. Has hidden motives and expects payment.

levels.1: Weak Guide: Limited occult knowledge, affects world with difficulty, not always available, may provide incorrect information.
levels.2: Minor Guide: Good occult/vampire knowledge, affects material world only when it suits its goals, fairly limited in physical manipulation.
levels.3: Apt Guide: Recognized in spirit world, aids with knowledge and training, may fight on your behalf, potentially wields minor Numina.
levels.4: Major Guide: Significant power and knowledge, can provide substantial supernatural assistance, influential in spirit realms.
levels.5: Powerful Guide: Formidable entity with extensive capabilities, but proportionally greater demands and mysterious agenda.

detached.name: Detached
detached.description: Wound penalties don't affect Psychic Numina until Incapacitated. At Incapacitated, spend WP for half dice pool once per scene.

black_and_white.name: Black and White
black_and_white.description: See everything as binary. +1 difficulty to social rolls where perspective applies.

combat_novice.name: Combat Novice
combat_novice.description: Roll WP (diff 7) when facing violence or freeze/flee. 5 accumulated successes = no more rolls that night.

addicted_to_vampire_blood.name: Addicted to Vampire Blood
addicted_to_vampire_blood.description: Need vitae rush. Self-Control to resist. +1 cumulative difficulty per week without.

paranoid.name: Paranoid
paranoid.description: Suspicious of everything. +1 difficulty all social rolls.

siege_mentality.name: Siege Mentality
siege_mentality.description: Agency is family. -2 dice Empathy/Investigation with civilians. +1 diff social with other agencies.

manchurian_candidate.name: Manchurian Candidate
manchurian_candidate.description: Unknowing double agent with programmed trigger.

hemophiliac.name: Hemophiliac
hemophiliac.description: Cannot stop bleeding. Additional bashing every 5 min until dressed.

aging.name: Aging
aging.description: Lower one Physical Attribute by 1. Available at 40+, once per decade.

occult_library.name: Occult Library
occult_library.description: -1 difficulty on occult research. 4pt includes Occult Laboratory.

pale_aura.name: Pale Aura
pale_aura.description: Aura appears vampiric unless 5+ successes on Aura Perception.

clear_sighted.name: Clear-Sighted
clear_sighted.description: Roll Per + Alertness (diff power+3) to see through Obfuscate, Chimerstry, etc.

poisonous_blood.name: Poisonous Blood
poisonous_blood.description: Each blood point causes 1 bashing to drinking vampire.

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Home requires WP check (diff 9) for supernaturals to enter uninvited.

psi_focus.name: Psi Focus
psi_focus.description: Require focus object to use psychic powers.

inter_agency_liaison.name: Inter-Agency Liaison
inter_agency_liaison.description: Work for two agencies, draw on both.

sanction.name: Sanction
sanction.description: Limited lethal force authorization against named targets.

ecstatic.name: Ecstatic
ecstatic.description: Religious ecstasy. +1 die Social with faithful.

ecumenist.name: Ecumenist
ecumenist.description: Use any faith's holy symbols. Allow multi-faith True Faith pooling.

fist_of_god.name: Fist of God
fist_of_god.description: Brawl damage is aggravated vs supernaturals. Requires Humanity 7+.

paradise_lost.name: Paradise Lost
paradise_lost.description: Lost True Faith. WP (diff 7) or -1 die when confronted with loss.

_meta.note: HH2 Numina. For Divination/Healing, see wr20.mortals.numina (Wr20 > V20).

levels.5: +4 difficulty AND -2 dice pool (Biblical scope, requires Humanity roll if 4+)

levels.4: Distant locations, interact with astral beings
levels.5: Master projection, resist attacks, find souls

levels.1: Sense electronics in line of sight
levels.2: Touch to read data, diagnose malfunctions
levels.4: Remote access within line of sight
levels.5: Full control (10 min/success). Device destroyed = 5 bashing.

via_geniorum.name: Via Geniorum (Way of Spirits)
via_geniorum.true_names: Int + Occult (diff 9) extended. -2 diff with true name.

arcanum.name: The Arcanum
arcanum.future: Chancellor Sandeep D'Souza pushing for more active stance

factions.italian_mafia: Family groups, revenge-driven, protect la famiglia
factions.russian_bratva: Ex-military bounty hunters, may use vitae stimulants, Arca lab rumor

ikhwan_al_safa.name: Ikhwan al-Safa (Brethren of Purity)
ikhwan_al_safa.text: Kanun Nameh-e-Safa (Law Book of the Pure)

knights_of_st_george.name: Knights of St. George
knights_of_st_george.notable: Includes alchemists, sorcerous numinists. Splinter Society of St. George wields magic.

_meta.note: Pre-generated hunters for immediate use as PCs or NPCs

obsessed_detective.name: The Obsessed Detective
obsessed_detective.concept: Police detective consumed by vampire investigation
obsessed_detective.description: Average build, sharp mind. Dark rings under eyes. Sports bag full of anti-vampire tools.
obsessed_detective.hook: Obsessed with unsolved 'animal attack' murders. Career suffering. Gathering evidence alone.

paranoid_surveyor.name: The Paranoid Surveyor
paranoid_surveyor.concept: City surveyor who found a vampire lair
paranoid_surveyor.description: Slightly overweight, thick-rimmed glasses, pens in pocket. Uses job to find havens by day.
paranoid_surveyor.hook: Found vampires during demolition survey. Uses redevelopment orders to expose havens to sunlight.

destitute_crusader.name: The Destitute Crusader
destitute_crusader.description: Hunched figure in winter coat and hoodie. Pretty face hidden. Uses improvised incendiary weapons.
destitute_crusader.hook: Survived Christmas vampire attack. Believes spared by God. Burns havens with siphoned petrol.

ruined_alderman.name: The Ruined Alderman
ruined_alderman.concept: City official Dominated into crime, seeking revenge
ruined_alderman.description: Formal dresser trying to disguise himself. Walking engine of rage. Wife and son left him.
ruined_alderman.hook: Vampire made him steal files via Dominate. Suspended, reputation ruined. Hunting his manipulator.

vengeful_wife.name: The Vengeful Wife
vengeful_wife.concept: Wealthy executive whose husband was Embraced then suicided
vengeful_wife.description: Attractive advertising exec. Occasional dark glint in eye. Platinum wedding ring. Spider at web center.
vengeful_wife.hook: Husband Embraced by Sabbat, escaped, then killed himself at sunrise. Now funding hunters to destroy his murderers. Camarilla secretly feeding her intel (she doesn't know yet).

genius_doctor.name: The Genius Doctor
genius_doctor.concept: Amoral researcher dissecting vampires for science
genius_doctor.description: Late 30s looking older. Pristine lab coat or pinstriped suit. Well-built, jogs mornings.
genius_doctor.hook: Caught vampire stealing blood. Kidnaps torpid vampires by day with paid interns. Dissects them seeking cancer cure. Will shatter Masquerade when he publishes.

jaded_journalist.name: The Jaded Journalist
jaded_journalist.concept: Freelance supernatural blogger feeding intel to hunters
jaded_journalist.description: Below average height, overweight. Raincoat and felt hat. Inhaler close at hand. Pockets bulging with gadgets.
jaded_journalist.hook: Tabloid Oddity Column veteran. Saw truth, story was buried. Now blogs and feeds intel to active hunters. Some die, some succeed. Growing fame is dangerous.

_meta.description: 24 interconnected NPC mages with rich story hooks and relationship networks
_meta.usage: Use as protagonists, antagonists, allies, mentors, or rivals. Characters are designed to be interconnected—introducing one leads to others.
_meta.note: All stats are 'Suggested' and can be adjusted to fit chronicle power levels

Celeste.role: Young witch inheriting an ancient lineage
Celeste.summary: Matricidal Verbena heir who murdered her mother to claim power. Believes killing Awakened allows her to absorb their Avatars. Her upcoming Anointment ceremony will draw important mages worldwide.
Celeste.image: Late teens with the wisdom of ages in her eyes. Long flowing white gowns, blonde curly hair, freckles, vibrant pale skin—personification of innocence.
Celeste.roleplaying_notes: Uses youth and inexperience to conceal nervousness about her crime. When commanding an audience, her demeanor shifts with passion. Only when making new memories does her true personality surface—cruel yet desperate.

The Caged Avatar.relationship: Could use his Avatar for the coming ceremony

Kindred Spirit.relationship: Desperate to share her secret; knows she can pin the murder on Jack if needed

The Servant.relationship: Bound to Céleste's wishes through inherited family pact

rise_and_ruin.title: Mother's Day
rise_and_ruin.description: Crime discovery—signs of wrongdoing if investigated

rise_and_ruin.title: The Anointment
rise_and_ruin.description: Ceremony with international attendees; needs another sacrifice

rise_and_ruin.title: Red Sky at Night
rise_and_ruin.description: Long-term corruption leading to Nephandi

Corey_Clutz_Whitman.summary: Gutter mage who brought the Fremont Troll to life during her Awakening. Deep connections to Seattle's unhoused population and the Bridge Trolls. Uses Matter magic to help resources stretch further.
Corey_Clutz_Whitman.image: Small but scrappy. Practical clothing, backpack always ready. Often performing with props and costumes for storytelling.
Corey_Clutz_Whitman.roleplaying_notes: Resourceful and community-minded. Bristles at recruiters who see her as naive. Values direct action to help people over Tradition politics.

A Helping Hand.relationship: Wants to make contact with the Black Jacket

Street Magick.relationship: Performs in front of Emma's murals; effects become more wondrous

rise_and_ruin.title: Missing Kid
rise_and_ruin.description: Teen from Tent City went missing after Awakening; Mirrorshades spotted

rise_and_ruin.title: Troll Walk Redux
rise_and_ruin.description: Plans to animate multiple sculptures against police clearing camps

rise_and_ruin.title: Turf War
rise_and_ruin.description: Trio attacked her; now imprisoned in nightmarish Shard Realm

Danni_Wildheart_Davies.role: Legendary rock star planning apocalyptic ascension
Danni_Wildheart_Davies.summary: Welsh glam/prog rock icon who Awakened during a 1977 arena tour. Now planning a 'farewell tour' where she intends to literally ascend to godhood by consuming her fans' souls.
Danni_Wildheart_Davies.image: Legendary presence despite age. Constantly reinventing style. Never off her game, exuding energy and enthusiasm.
Danni_Wildheart_Davies.roleplaying_notes: Makes everyone feel like the center of her attention—in that moment. The only thing that breaks her bubble is talk of home and Wales. Approaching a farewell tour with sinister finality.

Interview with the Rockstar.relationship: Seeking the Kha'vadi mage's knowledge for her Seeking

Before They Were Famous.relationship: Signed up for one of Xavier's perilous space races

rise_and_ruin.title: The Greatest Star
rise_and_ruin.description: Livestream goes wrong—attendees banished to Paradox realm

rise_and_ruin.title: The Greatest Show
rise_and_ruin.description: Plans to use fans' love to ascend, consuming their souls

rise_and_ruin.title: The Greatest Fall
rise_and_ruin.description: Tour cancelled/ruined; vengeance against those responsible

Elsa_Doppler.epithet: The Spy Who Couldn't Come in from the Cold
Elsa_Doppler.role: Double agent serving both Traditions and Technocracy
Elsa_Doppler.summary: Face-changing spy who has maintained cover in both the Order of Hermes and the NWO for decades. Recently 'borrowed' the wrong face, triggering a chain of events involving doppelgängers and the dwarf planet Ceres.
Elsa_Doppler.image: Changes frequently. Master of blending in. True appearance known to very few.
Elsa_Doppler.roleplaying_notes: Always calculating angles. Genuinely cares about contacts on both sides. The web of deception is becoming impossible to maintain.

The Etherite.relationship: Has been funneling his discoveries to the NWO

rise_and_ruin.title: Borrowed Face
rise_and_ruin.description: Copied wrong identity; doppelgängers now appearing

rise_and_ruin.title: Ceres Connection
rise_and_ruin.description: Obelisk on dwarf planet linked to her activities

rise_and_ruin.title: Coming In
rise_and_ruin.description: Cover blown; must choose a side or run

Emma_Tavares.role: Artist who paints portals and captures echoes of souls
Emma_Tavares.summary: Portuguese painter whose works serve as windows to other realms. Once accidentally transported to Doissetep through her own painting. Her art may capture echoes of subjects' Avatars.
Emma_Tavares.image: Portuguese woman around 60. Long gray-and-black hair in a braid. Comfortable paint-splattered clothes. Always a smudge of paint somewhere.
Emma_Tavares.roleplaying_notes: Lets others talk so she can observe. Comes through with surprising quips. Fascinated by stories of places she's only seen in dreams.

A Long-Lost Friend.relationship: Friends with Céleste's mother; offering to paint memorial portrait

Portrait of the Imposter.relationship: Painted one of his doppelgängers; portrait feels 'empty'

Work In Progress.relationship: Sketched scene of Xoca confronting ancient enemy; dreads painting it

rise_and_ruin.title: Captured Avatars
rise_and_ruin.description: Portraits may capture Avatar echoes; some worry enemies could use them

rise_and_ruin.title: Dangerous Visions
rise_and_ruin.description: Witnessed infernal bargain in dream; painting delivered to characters; Emma missing

Hyeonmyeong_Sunim.summary: Reincarnation of King Myeongjong of the Joseon Dynasty. One of the most powerful mages on Earth, yet humble and kind. Blinded during the War in Heaven. May have died/reincarnated in some chronicles.
equipment: Prayer beads (change bead count after each cycle)
Hyeonmyeong_Sunim.image: Short, thin Korean man appearing in his eighties. Creased with laugh lines. Wears hanbok (traditional Korean clothing). Pale, sightless eyes after the War in Heaven. Flame-shaped birthmark on left side of neck.
Hyeonmyeong_Sunim.roleplaying_notes: Humble and affable despite immense power. Treats conversations as opportunities to learn. Treasures each meeting. Few things move him to violence, but his wrath is a terror to behold.

reincarnated.description: Reincarnated as Korean-American trans man from Oakland, born 1988
reincarnated.image: Leather jacket and pants, bucked Kannagara's shaved head custom, one of the most attractive monks

The Smiling Student.relationship: Former kōhai; regular tea and go games

The Wanderer.relationship: Kept secret contact with her family after she left Vajrapani

The Troupe.relationship: May invite them to face 'trials'; who recommended them?

rise_and_ruin.title: Out of Service
rise_and_ruin.description: Bodhimandala in Bugu, Korea unreachable; sabotage?

rise_and_ruin.title: Corner of the Eye
rise_and_ruin.description: Odd spiritual presence following him; spoke a secret only he knows

rise_and_ruin.title: They See You Coming
rise_and_ruin.description: Former kōhai Tawhiri captured by Technocrats; rescue needed

Jack.role: Master thief and procurer of magical artifacts
Jack.summary: Non-binary con artist from a family of grifters. Awakened in a Van Gogh exhibit. Specializes in acquiring magical artifacts for clients. Planning the heist of a legendary vault.
Jack.image: Slim non-binary white person in early-to-mid 40s. Epitome of fashion with bespoke suits. Can look 10 years older or younger through disguise.
Jack.roleplaying_notes: Easily approachable, delighted to learn about anything. Remembers personal details about everyone. Protective of crew. No artwork is worth more than a person's life.

The Artist.relationship: Owns several pieces; one 're-appropriated'; figures appear to move in the painting

The Colleague.relationship: Professional respect; meet to talk shop over drinks

Unexpected Blowback.relationship: Offered her a job; now she's threatening to take out Jack

rise_and_ruin.title: The Big Heist
rise_and_ruin.description: Planning theft of legendary vault spanning Tellurian and Otherworld

rise_and_ruin.title: On the Hook
rise_and_ruin.description: Always seeking new talent for jobs

rise_and_ruin.title: High Alert
rise_and_ruin.description: Drained Syndicate funds; now hunted

Jacob_Mullen.summary: Former con man and twin who murdered his brother. After encountering a mysterious Obelisk on Ceres, doppelgängers of himself began appearing. Uses games of chance to determine his targets.
Jacob_Mullen.image: Hale and hearty despite hard life. Thinning gray hair swept back. Sharp suits, big bets, open wallet. Enjoys finest things.
Jacob_Mullen.roleplaying_notes: Expert at insinuating into conversations. Uses negative statements to draw emotional counters. Family is critical topic. Never stays to watch the fallout of his kills.

Musical Cue.relationship: Brother loved her music; doppelgänger appeared humming her songs

The Orbital Obelisk.relationship: Xavier took one of Jacob's doppelgängers on tour of Ceres

Shared Loss.relationship: Invited to Anointment; plans to console her; will see doppelgänger talking to her first

rise_and_ruin.title: The Doppelgängers
rise_and_ruin.description: Two distinct versions appearing; working toward something

rise_and_ruin.title: The Obelisk
rise_and_ruin.description: Source of the doppelgängers; on or near Ceres

rise_and_ruin.title: The Return
rise_and_ruin.description: Planning return to the Obelisk; needs disposable team

Jano_Highwalker.summary: Native American survivor of residential schools who Awakened during the Standing Rock protests after being assaulted with water cannons. Now travels to protests, using prayer and song to create peace.
Jano_Highwalker.image: Elderly Native American man. Weathered but determined. Traditional dress mixed with practical protest gear.
Jano_Highwalker.roleplaying_notes: Places himself in direct conflict with authority. Prayer-song calms crowds and disperses violence. Deep faith in the Creator over Tradition politics.

The Traditionalist.relationship: Bond through Indigenous roots and syncretized faith

The Militant.relationship: Both on frontlines but opposite methods; deep mutual disrespect

The Singing Star.relationship: Met at benefit concert; sensed something sinister in her

rise_and_ruin.title: Border Rally
rise_and_ruin.description: May intercept Xoca at Mexico-Guatemala rally

rise_and_ruin.title: Summit
rise_and_ruin.description: Floating idea of summit between peace and action philosophies

Julieta_Santos.summary: High-functioning addict who Awakened after 9 days of drug-aided sleep deprivation. Now a Magadon Pharmaceuticals executive seeding custom psychoactive compounds worldwide to trigger mass Awakening—regardless of the deaths it will cause.
Julieta_Santos.image: At work: long hair in tight bun with pens, suit and lab-coat. Off duty: lets hair down, party clothes. Glowing skin, vibrant brown eyes.
Julieta_Santos.roleplaying_notes: Either calm/mellow or highly strung—no middle ground. Kind and generous streak, wants everyone to have same opportunities. Impulse control can be off.

Collateral Damage.relationship: Someone in Seattle obstructing distribution; sent lackeys but lost contact

Interception.relationship: Mr. Simmons intercepted plans; being blackmailed for paramilitary resources

Mickey.summary: Powerful ex-Hermetic who wants nothing more than to return to normal life. Moves from family to family, mind-controlling them into accepting him, leaving carnage when it inevitably falls apart.
Mickey.image: Appearance ties to integration with current family. When settled: clean and matching. When deteriorating: bedraggled, avoids mirrors.
Mickey.roleplaying_notes: Intensely private about history. Fiercely protective of current 'family.' Questions about the supernatural trigger volatile response. When encountered casually: genial and social.

Netra_Nur.image: Long of limb, graceful, nimble. Dancer's body with constant poise. Guiling beauty.
Netra_Nur.roleplaying_notes: Not obnoxious but has large sense of self-worth. Warned by Hyeonmyeong about ego being her doom in past lives. Doesn't always recognize right from wrong in Tradition politics.

Onkgopotse_de_Groot.roleplaying_notes: Overflowing with excitement to learn. Jovial and sincere but deeply dedicated. When storytelling: stands, uses hands, makes noises, dramatic pauses. Expert at hiding emotional toll of bearing stories of the dispossessed.

Pulmari.image: Athletic, handsome, appears decade younger. Thick black mutton chops, colorful headbands, Mapuche poncho. Fiercely proud Indigenous identity.

Purnama.image: True form: beautiful but alien, glowing skin, sharp features, wide copper eyes, all hair shaved/plucked. Wears long flowing white gowns or nothing.
Purnama.roleplaying_notes: Spiritual embodiment of change. Mimics people who fail to understand themselves. Chooses personality to encourage allies. Hidden heart: zealotry for spirits of moon and stars.

Xoca.role: Legendary Ascension warrior with spirit army
Xoca.summary: Maya war mage, possibly Guatemalan. One of the most infamous Ascension warriors in history, alongside Dante, Senex, and Porthos Fitz-Empress. Commands army of war, violence, and pain spirits. Wears the legendary Rainbow Breastplate.

talisman.name: Rainbow Breastplate

_meta.description: Elder-level Discipline powers associated with the Anarch Movement
_meta.note: Anarch elders are rare and often reluctant to share these powers, preferring to wield them as champions to inspire younger Anarchs

Alabastard.description: Derisively named after a tough-as-hell Baron. Ignore all wound and movement penalties from damage. Storyteller may impose logical situational penalties (e.g., being cut in half should affect movement).

Tireless Tread.description: Travel at 50 mph on foot by finding a traveler's rhythm. Must travel minimum 400 miles (8+ hours). If you tarry too much, the pace is lost and power fails entirely. Virtually untraceable - no tickets, license plates, or paper trail.
Tireless Tread.history: Much of the initial Anarch Revolt was spent fleeing unfavorable odds. This power made many escapes possible.

Turnabout.description: Meld with earth and emerge on other side of foe. After sinking into ground, emerge behind or to either side of enemies (your choice) on next turn, up to 50 feet in any direction. Originally used by Eastern European Gangrel and Tzimisce, adapted as guerrilla tactic during Anarch Revolt.

Scourging the Instinct.description: Stand before followers and whip them into righteous frenzy. Those affected 'ride the wave' of frenzy (V20 pp. 314-315) regardless of whether they have Instinct or Self-Control.
Scourging the Instinct.system: Roll Charisma + Leadership (diff 7). Successes = number of Kindred affected.
Scourging the Instinct.warning: Dangerous power, rarely used in modern nights

Vengeance of the Martyr's Legacy.description: Send surge of blood-rage through your bloodline, causing ALL descendants to enter frenzy wherever they are, even in daily slumber.

variants.Mandate (Presence 7): Frenzy occurs automatically without roll (may subvert with Willpower as normal)

Vengeance of the Martyr's Legacy.warning: Extremely dangerous - few Kindred know where all their descendants are at any time

Oathbreaker.description: Break blood bonds. This power played no small part in triggering the Anarch Revolt 800+ years ago. Some suspect it provided basis for the Vaulderie.
Oathbreaker.system: Spend blood and Willpower to imbue your blood with bond-breaking properties (1 blood point = 1 draught). Blood retains property for one night. Consumer feels immediate cessation of any blood bond.
Oathbreaker.duration: Freedom lasts one month and one night
Oathbreaker.trap: After that period, the activating vampire may spend 1 Willpower to replace the suborned bond with illusory bond to herself (lasts one night, or one year and one night for 10 Willpower spent in single scene). If not renewed, original bond returns immediately.
Oathbreaker.warning: This is historically a fool's bargain used to ensnare desperate Kindred
